title: Excellent service
text: The rooms are huge, they have balconies, the hotel is absolutely beautiful and the breakfast buffet was great. The thing that made this hotel so wonderful was the service. It was my 10 year old daughter’s first trip to the city and the bellman made her feel special from the moment we arrived. They went above and beyond the entire trip. They also looked out for us when we were leaving and arriving. They staff was quick to meet any need we had. I will never forget the kindness and service from this hotel. Can’t wait to come back!

title: An amazing experience
text: This is one of the best Hotels that we ever stayed at.  The rooms are huge and the service is amazing.  The doorman Ralph was one of the nicest individuals I ever met. He made our stay welcoming.  Highly recommend for a family of 4.  Everything was spotless and the food was amazing.

title: Situation géographique parfaite et service très attentionné
text:
un grand hôtel mais avec un accueil personnalisé 
ce qui est agréable c'est que les gens s'occupe vraiment de vous 
Le service de nettoyage en chambre est simplement PARFAIT rien à redire 
Le service des bagagistes est exceptionnel ils  vous appellent par votre nom vous aide pour vos sacs de shopping et toujours avec le sourire 
Le petit déjeuner au dernier étage avec une vue sur NYC incroyable le serveur s'occupe de vous sans être envahissant je ne connais pas son nom il a des origines slave je pense , il se souvient de ce que vous avez pris comme thé la veille , cela est très appréciable.    Quant à la situation géographique, elle est simplement parfaite , à deux pas de la 5eme avenue et Madisson , à 15 minutes à Pied de time square , et surtout vous avez tout à pied , restaurant, bar et même pour nous les filles salon de manucure ce qui est appréciable

title: Love the Kimberley
text: Always a great experience with great service.  And a great midtown location.  Sadie at the front desk went above and beyond accommodating us.  Everyone is the best.  This was our 7th stay and we will be back.  The penthouse is great for a complimentary coffee and snack during the day and drinks and late night dinner.

title: Great experience
text: Fantastic location, great service and clean rooms. Really a good value for money in the area. Rooftop is fun and staff is friendly and always helpful. Quiet rooms. The room is spacious and comfortable with old style but refurbished room. Great hotel

title: Best service Ever!!
text: I stayed at the Kimberly hotel from April 5th to the 6th for a celebration of life. The brunch was absolutely Amazing! Besides all the amenities, what really stood out the most for me was the service! Hands down the Best service I have ever experienced! There are a few employees that really stood out that went above and beyond! In no special order, I wanted to name them! Max(Mentor) and Ralph were hands down INCREDIBLE! Also, Nick and Harry went above and beyond as well! Words can not express how grateful I am for all the assistance and care they gave! Also, MD at the front desk was extremely helpful and kind as well! As nice as this Hotel is, it is actually the service that will bring me back! Hands down the Best hotel experience Ever!!xx

title: Celebrating our 50th Birthday's with ours son's also turning 16&18, this was a memorable lifetime family experience.FAB
text: Staff were so helpful & friendly. My Autistic son who gets anxious, was even able to relax & ate pancakes for breakfast (Thanks Ari,  you were so helpful) when he normally wouldn't when away. Great location to get to; Central Park, Empire State Building, Times Square. The rooms were spacious for 4 of us and with great kitchen area. Reception staff were lovely & always able to help with anything that needed doing or suggesting things; MD & Serena thank you! Marcia; Director of Sales is a ☆!

title: disappointed
text: The refrigerator in the room broke down and the food I took went bad. And I had to use the elevator back from the main lobby and it is like a cargo elevator to get to my room. It was so weird and I had to go through the warehouse floor every time..I am not going to visit this hotel again..

title: Awesome hotel in a great location with excellent staff. Clean, comfortable and friendly staff very spacious rooms for th
text: Excellent hotel, friendly staff that go above and beyond. Clean facility. Very convenient to all sites. Restaurants at the hotel are good. The penthouse bar is excellent. Rooms are quite spacious for the city. We had a king suite and we stayed with our two children. There are two full baths which is a big plus. Will stay here again.

title: Convenvient, luxurious and clean
text: This is a great hotel. The location is excellent. Good food and drug store options nearby. One block from the 6 and three blocks from the E trains.  An easy walk to Grand Central. The rooms are clean and comfortable. They took care of our luggage. The staff was excellent and always looking to help us. Harry at the front desk checked-in on us to make sure any additional needs were taken care of.  I would gladly stay here again.

title: Family spring break
text: Old school feel with authentic NY charm.  The bellmen out front are very hospitable.  Rooftop, whether for breakfast or nightcaps is outstanding.  Felt very safe the entire time, great proximity to NY energy but very quiet room.  Would highly recommend

title: Very comfortable business or leisure stay
text: Another good stay. Only advice is they always say when you arrive early to leave your bags and phone number and they will call you when the room is ready. Stay here all the time for business and leisure trips and have never received a call. They might want to improve on that.

title: Excellent service and convenient location
text: We really enjoyed our stay at the Kimberly. Our room was spacious and comfortable. The service was excellent - everyone was very friendly and helpful, much more than at other places I’ve stayed in NYC. The location is great, walkable to many attractions. I’m very happy we found this hotel!

title: Home from home
text: A truly amazing hotel with excellent staff . Extremely comfortable and relaxing. The rooms are huge with all the added extras. Nothing is too much trouble and the staff are always ready to help. A home from home in the city within walking distance of Times Square

title: 5 star stay!!
text: Love this hotel!  There was so much space in our suite- unheard of in manhatten. Lots of special touches - umbrellas, free bottled water, etc. Great location. Everything was perfect.  Responded immediately when told them remote needs new batteries

title: Best home base to explore Manhattan.
text: The Kimberly Hotel was the perfect home base for us to explore Manhattan. Super convenient for walking to 5th Avenue, Times Square, Central Park and quick hired drives to the major attractions. On a less busy street which was nice, and two good restaurant choices right from the hotel lobby. All the staff were lovely. We had a great experience and would stay again in future.

title: Girls Trip
text: This hotel was wonderful. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. They went out of their way to make sure our stay was perfect. The hotel was very clean. Our hotel room was beautiful, and we had plenty of room. Whenever we left the hotel the bellman were so helpful, making sure we were headed somewhere safe, running to get us umbrellas to keeps us dry. I cannot say enough good things about these hotel.  We will definitely be staying here again. I high recommend this hotel.

title: My “go-to” hotel when in New York!
text: Great service, ambience, and large comfortable suites/rooms. My “go to”hotel whenever we are in New York.  Location is central to everything and attached restaurants are worthy of high praise. I am a great fan of the Kimberly! The doorman even greets you by your name on repeat stays-makes you feel at home.

title: They treat you like family
text: The Kimberly Hotel was such a great experience. Such a classic, quaint hotel in a great location. The staff was unbelievable-they treated you like a family member not a guest! The on-site restaurants and rooftop bar were awesome. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice, classic, safe place to stay in NYC!

title: Five nights of  quiet and comfort in a great location
text:
Having stayed at hotels over the years, I would say our nicely sized room at the Kimberly was unusually quiet (alasno view) and very comfy.   Great pillows! We had a little kitchen and a very large bathroom -- chose the Handicapped option on Expedia.
Staff is lovely.  Decor borders on kitsch, and we loved it for what it is.

title: Best hidden Gem
text:
We had the pleasure of staying at the Kimberly where we’ve had two suites. We have now found our home away from home in the city. 

The staff is an integral backbone of this hotel. It started with communication with the Sales Director, Ms. James, whose responsiveness was incredible! I knew from that connection that this was validation of all I’ve read about this staff and this property, 

We were greeted by the wonderful staff  upon check in.  We then developed a great relationship with Mo and Cheryl the evening crew at the desk who couldn’t be any kinder and helpful. They definitely helped made our stay even more pleasant. 

We had meals in both the Upstairs and Bistango restaurants. They were both amazing and the staff fit both were equally amazing. 

Our suites were amazingly spacious, and the bed was oh so comfortable. The only thing we encountered was low pressure in the flushing of the toilets which could have been due to the floor level. This was never a show stopper.

While the hotel is centrally located, it was also on a quiet street. Kudos again to the entire staff, we can’t wait to be back.

title: Best experience in NYC we’ve ever had!
text: Absolutely wonderful and attentive staff, well appointed rooms (and VERY ROOMY), clean throughout, and above and beyond service from everyone we came in contact with from the property. We WILL be back!  Room service was prompt and they set the table!! 🌃

title: Great staff
text:
Rooms were spacious and fully equipped. Bed was super comfortable. The staff was professional., knowledgable, and really helpful and accommodating. They were kid friendly as well. Loved the entire weekend stay and plan to return.  Also great location. Just a short walk from GCS. . 

. .

title: One of my best stay
text: I stayed in the one bed suite for 4 days along with my family and it was the best stay I had since visiting New York city. The reception staff specially MD, the gentlemen at the doors the cleaning stay was so friendly and polite. Clean and comfortable, and most of all so quiet! Recommend to anyone traveling to Manhattan area.

title: great room and location
text: We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite, 29th floor. I loved this room. It was clean, quiet, spacious, and attractive. My husband is a tv watcher, I am not, with the bedroom door closed, I heard nothing. Balcony has a great view of several art deco sky scrappers. Hotel is walking distance or an easy subway ride to all Manhattan. Staff are friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.

title: The lovely Kimberly Hotel
text: The rooms are roomy and the amenities are first rate, think L’Occitane and Mackenzie Childs! I stayed twice and noticed the rooms are getting a facelift. They are nice as is but the upgrades take them to a new level. I can tell the hotel was once a residential building as it has many homey features like large balconies , closets  galore and outside storage. The marble baths are outfitted marvelously with both rain shower and handheld fixtures from Lefroy Brooks. When in NYC I will always try to book here. It’s central location and nearness to the 6 subway makes it ideal for business or leisure travel.

title: Hidden gem, don’t hesitate!
text: What a wonderful find in the city! Quiet location, close to everything, most accommodating and helpful staff, beautiful!! MD, Julianne and the entire staff made our stay exceptional!! Beautiful view from our balcony, very comfy beds and spacious suites, great amenities. I could go on. I have nothing but great things to say about our experience. We’ll be back!!

title: Hidden Gem in NYC
text:
I am so glad I found a hidden jam in NYC! Kimberly Hotel is conveniently located in midtown, close to all the landmarks yet in a quiet street. E Train Lexington station is right around the corner. The suite is very roomy, with nicely equipped kitchenette including plates, glasses, bowls, utensils, microwave and a dishwasher.  Room deco is classic with old time elegance.  The most impressive part of my stay was the service from all the staff, from the front desk to the doormen to the housekeeping/maintenance staff.  I asked for a sewing kit and the staff delivered to my room in a very cute small shopping bag!  Special thanks to Cheryl, Ralph, David and doorman Harry, who helped us whenever we had questions.  
I will bring my family back again in May.

title: Hit the spot for one night visit
text: A first time stay at the Kimberly Hotel. Did a Tuesday night in a one bedroom suite with balcony. I would describe the hotel as quaint from the rooms, to the rooftop lounge, the commons areas,even the front desk had a Art Deco old time phone that functions. Can not give any feedback on the neighborhood as we had 3 planned visits at Rockerfeller Center, Hudson Yards and Peak restaurant in Hudson Yards via cab. The room and bedding was comfortable and spacious for  major city. It was filled with vintage looking comfortable accessories. The best part was the staff from the welcoming doorman and valets to the front desk and including the rooftop bar staff everyone was friendly, helpful and professional. Will return and can highly recommend. Since it is in New York City it is not valued priced but was certainly priced correctly for the services and space provided. Can recommend the valet parking(no in/out, quick), the rooftop lounge in evening for drinks/views and the bed was highly comfortable.

title: Inconsistent
text:
We stayed at the kimberly for 3 nights in their luxury one bedroom suite.  It was a mixed bag. The good : the suite was  very spacious with a separate living area, dining table set and a galley type kitchen. Large bedroom with lots of storage space. The suite was spotless. The housekeeping staff were 100% amazing as were the doormen. One of the front desk staff was very helpful providing  options for dinner choices when the concierge was not available. Great location. 
The bad: the individual who checked us in barely made eye contact or smiled and was not welcoming at all. The bathroom had a gaping hole behind the toilet which made my daughter very  uncomfortable. Sure it wasn’t anything nefarious but why would a luxury hotel put guests in a suite in this condition especially when hidden cameras are something people are concerned about? We noticed this on our first night and didn’t want anyone coming into the room to investigate so late at night. I called the front desk, relayed the issue and asked to be contacted the next day to resolve our concern. No one ever followed up. We used a towel to block the hole for our stay. 

Tip: The view from the Luxury suites with two beds is a bit rough. Choose the king bed option for a better view.

title: Wonderful time at the Kimberly Hotel
text: I just stayed at the Kimberly with my 9 year old daughter. We had the absolute best time and she rated it “the best hotel ever” Beautiful, clean, spacious and charming. The front desk and doormen were exceptional and made my daughter feel like a princess. The restaurants were beautiful and delicious. The kindness and attentiveness of the staff really made this .. our first trip to NYC absolutely unforgettable ! We will be back!

title: Our Home Away From Home
text:
From the time you walk in every single staff member is professional and attentive.  This is consistent every time we stay at The Kimberly!
It is truly the best hotel in midtown. Close to the theatre district, shopping, and great restaurants.

title: Beautiful hotel
text: Old style Hollywood type of vibe. It’s a beautiful hotel. My room was humongous. It was a king suite with a balcony that was accessible. Everyone was so polite and helpful. It’s in the perfect spot not too far from all the good luxury shopping on 5th ave and not too far from Times Square.

title: Lovely hotel
text: Spent one night with my daughter and grandchildren. The staff is super friendly and very gracious. Rooms are spacious. Great location, we chose this one for its proximity to Grand Central Station. Room was very quiet, not a lot of outside noise. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Perfect stay for our family
text: The Kimberly was truly wonderful to stay at for our family. The suite was a game changer, it was so clean and the beds super comfortable. I think we’ve found our spot for staying in NYC! Also very conveniently located and the staff was friendly and helpful.

title: Superb on every level
text: After staying there many times through the years, The Kimberly never disappoints! From the  front desk staff to the doormen to the maids….the entire experience was superb on every level and the suites are spotless.  5 stars! It is the perfect place to stay in New York whether for a day or a month!

title: Perfect for a family with 3 small kids.
text: Hotel is in pristine condition. Rooms huge for price and clean. Great for families. Our 3 young daughters loved the hotel and especially the fish tank. In terms of value i have yet to see better in midtown. Short walk to Rockefeller and Times Square. We will be back. Thank you!

title: Highly recommended for a family trip
text:
Wanted to stay in a central location but also wanted more than just one room for our family of 4. Kimberley was absolutely perfect - nice comfy double room for us, and a living room with sofa bed and pullout bed for the kids. Two bathrooms as well. Balcony was not somewhere you’d want to go out onto but at least we had some light. 

Not super spacious of course (this is New York) but cosy even in February and incredibly well located. Could walk to so many places yet weren’t in the tourist mayhem of Times Square.

Hotel style is very much classic. No attempts at coolness - this is a carpet and cosy wood kind of place - which worked very well. 

Service was astonishingly good. Reception team nice, doormen super friendly and the guys at breakfast were truly fantastic (big shout to the Albanian football-fan waiter!). We had breakfast included and there was a nice choice available. Lovely breakfast/bar room too. 

Considering everything else in New York was unbelievably expensive, the Kimberley is also spectacular value. A gem.

title: Wife’s 50th Birthday
text: Unbelievable Hotel, couldn’t ask for more from the staff. Came for my wife’s 50th and were surprised by a complimentary bottle of bubbly to help celebrate the occasion. Great location and easy to navigate everywhere you want to go…will be returning

title: No Hot Water
text: My wife accompanied me for a business trip.  We had no hot water the first day of our stay.  I was promised updates on the repair, which never came, as well as a call from the manager, which also never came.  I don't think the hotel could possibly have cared less about the inconvenience. I'll update this if I ever hear from them.

title: Skønt hotel i rolig del af NYC
text:
Skønt, gammelt hotel med god atmosfære. 
Et værelse med kitchenette kan anbefales, hvis man ikke vil spise ude tre gange om dagen. 
God og rolig beliggenhed med let adgang til subway og gåafstand til Grand Central Central. 
Der blev optaget afsnit til den nye serie ‘Elsbeth’ lige uden for hotellets indgang, mens vi boede her 🎬

title: Always a pleasure
text: The hotel is comfortable with an old European flare.  The staff and service  is always exceptional.  They are in a great location within walking distance to Park and Madison.  The rooftop is relaxing for breakfast and great for drinks in the evening.

title: Mother/daughter  weekend
text: The Kimberly was everything and more. We had a suite with two queens and separate living room with kitchenette. It must have been a small apartment at one time as the living room is huge. There’s plenty of room to walk around the beds and three big closets. The beds are very comfortable. It is a boutique hotel with only a few rooms on each floor so it’s very quiet. The staff is welcoming and responsive. Requested ice  was delivered within 2 minutes, the doormen and bell hops greeted us coming and going all weekend, doors were opened for us and front desk staff very welcoming. Have a drink at the rooftop bar as the atmosphere is fun and yet again, the wait staff was attentive. We never once had to ask to refill water and plates were cleared promptly. We will most definitely be back.

title: Excellent Hotel. Fantastic Staff!
text:
We stayed at The Kimberly Hotel in early January. I was a part of a group in New York participating in a cultural exchange.  The hotel is well maintained and we had a very comfortable stay.  The location was perfect for our trip as we were close to restaurants, shopping and theatres.

Our experience was enhanced by the care shown to us by all the staff.  

Thank You:

Ralph and the staff at the front door who assisted with our luggage and really looked out for our large group on our daily arrivals and departures.

Sadie and the front desk crew who were so pleasant and answered all our questions with clarity.

Jose and other bell staff who always had a smile and ensured we got all our packages to our rooms.

Jing and the housekeeping staff who kept our areas tidy and refreshed our rooms.

Riyad, Gus and the breakfast team who looked out for us every morning. Thank you for making provisions for us to dine together at breakfast and remembering how we take our coffee. It may seem like a small thing but it helped us to feel like we were 'home' for that week away from home.

To Marcia you are an exceptional host and we appreciate all that you and your staff did to ensure that our trip to New York was a successful one.  

I would definitely recommend The Kimberly Hotel for business or family travel when in NYC.

Nadia

title: Excellent hotel
text: Stayed here with my wife and two daughters over the Christmas period.  It's a fantastic hotel, only a 2 minute walk to the nearest subway station.  There are 3 restaurants on site, plus a lot more within walking distance.  Rooms are extremely well maintained and the staff are very friendly and helpful.   Beds are very comfortable as well.  I'd be more than happy to stay here again.

title: Hidden gem of a hotel in midtown Manhattan
text: Fantastic hotel in a great location, superb service, amenities, and friendly staff. Three great restaurants, room service and an amazing rooftop, with valet parking makes it the perfect hotel in New York City.

title: Wonderful stay at The Kimberly
text: We were greeted by the most pleasant staff that helped us with luggage and arranged for our car during our entire weekend visit. The front desk provided us with the a gorgeous room with a view and balcony. We were pleasantly surprised with a complementary cheese platter upon arriving in our room. The manager, Mr. Abrishamian, stopped by informing us about the amenities and recommended that we visit the rooftop lounge for drinks and meals recommendation during our stay. We highly recommend The Kimberly and look forward to returning in the future.

title: The Kimberly - a newly discovered gem!
text: The 1 bedroom suite was fabulous. The beds were soooo comfortable. Their attention to detail was very obvious! The staff were phenomenal. Would highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for exceptional quality and service!

title: My Favorite NYC hotel !
text: Absolutely wonderful !! From the front desk to housekeeping and doorman/valet. I will be staying here every single time I come to nyc ! Ralph and harry were lovely and so sweet to my family, they had a secret handshake!. The hotel was so clean and I found not one single issue with our room. Excellent !!

title: Wonderful stay!
text:
Wonderful! You never know what you are going to get when staying in Manhattan, but this was a wonderful surprise! Huge one bedroom suite (that has been bigger than many of my own NYC apartments,) clean, beautiful new bathroom and kitchenette. We stayed with two children who took over the living room while we enjoyed the king sized bedroom. The location is fantastic, it was quiet but had a great restaurant and rooftop lounge. Breakfast was excellent and a good price! Service was top notch.
Is it Bougie? Nope. Is it Trendy? No. It was like many classic hotels I’ve enjoyed in Europe. We will stay again. The Kimberly is a drop of sanity and peace in midtown east.

title: Exceptional ♥️
text:
The hotel and the staffs are very nice.  Checked in so easy. Very roomy at good price. High end room amenities. The small kitchen with all the kitchen utencils also a plus.  The view from our room is magnificent! I never expected this.

We highly recommend this hotel.

title: Superb stay
text:
Highly recommend this hotel if going to New York.
Loved how spacious the rooms were which was ideal for our family of 6. Also very comfortable and so well equipped. Hotel staff were a  pleasure to deal with. Quiet location very convenient to all attractions in New York.

title: Superbe hôtel
text:
L'équipe hôtelière est juste incroyable, que ce soit les portiers, la réception ou les restaurants, c'est une équipe vraiment extra. On voyage beaucoup surtout aux États-Unis et on a jamais été aussi bien accueilli qu'au kimberly.
Les chambres sont grandes et spacieuse, super pour une famille avec jeunes enfants et l'hôtel est hyper bien situé, à 5min du rockfeller center, on y a été pour les fêtes de fin d'année et franchement on a été bien contents d'être loin de time square et autres. Et en même temps on est proche de tout vraiment superbe, je recommande fortement cet hôtel aux familles qui veulent avoir de la place dans leur chambre, et avoir un hôtel bien situé dans un joli quartier à la 50th.
J'oubliais aussi le style New-Yorkais à la maman j'ai rater l avion qui est juste sublime. On est totalement dans l'ambiance.

title: Truly a special hotel
text: This hotel is phenomenal. We stayed for one night before Christmas for our anniversary. We stayed in a 1 bedroom king suite with a balcony. The room was ready for us before check in time. It was beautiful, perfectly clean, and very comfortable. So many small touches in the room was there for our comfort. You could tell that the management there was thoughtful about the guest's experience. The hotel staff sent us a beautiful anniversary gift of champagne with a cheese and fruit plate and a lovely card. The rooftop at the upstairs penthouse was also stunning, and they gave us complimentary coffee, tea, and cakes during the afternoon. Overrall, this is a very special hotel where you will be treated very well.

title: Znakomity hotel w samym centrum Manhattanu
text: Fantastyczny hotel w samym centrum Manhattanu (10 minut spacerem od Rockefeller Center). Bardzo duże pokoje - nie tylko jak na standard Nowego Jorku. Opis i zdjęcia pokoju zamieszczone w ofercie są zgodne z rzeczywistością (w tym balkon wychodzący na 50 ulicę). Wyposażenie pokoju i aneksu kuchennego w zasadzie kompletne. Bardzo miła i profesjonalna obsługa. W hotelu dwie bardzo dobre restauracje - włoska oraz specjalizująca się w stekach, zaś na ostatnim piętrze bar Upstairs z widokiem na Chrysler Building. POLECAM!

title: I had spent NYE 2024 at Upstairs at the Kimberly Hotel in Midtown Manhattan and I had another great time bringing in the New Yea
text: I had another great time bringing in the New Year at Upstairs at the Kimberly. Such a festival time there. I strongly recommend people to attend the NYE celebration. Overall the Hotel staff always treated me with such kindness . Upstairs have such amazing views of Midtown Manhattan

title: Great service and location!
text: We really enjoyed our stay at the Kimberly Hotel. It has large rooms, a well-equipped kitchen and it's situated at the perfect location (near Grand Central Station and Times Square). There is a coffee machine in the kitchen, but you also have the option to enjoy a free cup of coffee and snack on the roof terrace. Also, the staff was very friendly and helped us out a great deal. A special thank you to MD and Cheryl for their excellent service! I would definitely recommend this hotel for your stay in Manhattan.

title: East Side Gem with Classic Hospitality!
text: Mo at the front desk was so welcoming!  We appreciate him asking about our room preferences and loved the accommodations.  The hotel is convenient to so many great NYC landmarks and still reasonably priced for all of its amenities!  We frequent the city a lot throughout the year and already looking forward to coming back!

title: Old World charm
text: This hotel was just what I wanted for our NYC Christmas trip. Located close enough to walk to some things but far enough away from the craziness of Rockefeller and Times Square. Also there are a couple of nearby subway stations. The Kimberly has old world charm, was decorated beautifully for Christmas and has very warm, welcoming and helpful staff. They offer complimentary bottles water, daily room refresh, free pastries from 11-4 in the Upstairs bar. We loved coming “home” to the Kimberly every evening after a long day of experiencing NYC at Christmas. Highly recommend this hotel. You will not be disappointed.

title: Been before will be back
text: Just fabulous all the way around......roof top bar not so much but it is December so. Great location on a relatively quiet street but close to EVErYTHING! staff is very friendly and accommodating. Rooms are spacious and cleaned daily.

title: Perfect:)
text: We had a great stay.  Our family of 4 stayed in a suite with 2 beds and a pull out couch and it was perfect.  We loved the kitchenette.  We went to a market at the beginning of our stay and had snacks which was great for our family.  It was also nice to be able to keep and eat leftovers.  Every staff member at this hotel goes above and beyond.  The doorman was great with the kids and helped with everything from crossing the street to umbrellas to finding our Uber to the revolving door.  The front desk was invaluable with advice and booking cars etc.  the neighborhood is safe and it is a great location.  We loved the restaurant across the street as well as the Italian onsite.  Upstairs they offer complimentary coffee, tea and pastries from 11-4 and it is a lovely bar/tapas at night with good service and reasonable prices (for nyc). There is a nice view of the Chrysler building and a break from the crowds.  They have shopping bags in the closet…apparently nyc does not give shopping bags so if you go anywhere take these with you to avoid the bag fees.   We didn’t check luggage so I love that they had quality shampoo, conditioner and body wash.  We loved staying here and will stay here every time we return.

Wow what can I not say about this fabulous hotel!!! This is the place to stay!!! I am an event coordinator and was testing this place out, and it went above and beyond my expectations! Lets start with the boutique chic feel, the warmest welcome that I have ever received from a hotel,  and the outstanding hospitality this place gives! Claudio, thank you so much for accommodating us arriving earlier than check in time! You saved us! Your expertise and amazing welcome was just the beginning of an amazing experience!!! This place is the place to stay in NY!!! And did I mention the mattress?? I wanted to take it home with me! My back never felt better! And ohhhh that rooftop restaurant! You must eat breakfast there! And the best steak is at Empire steak house downstairs! Honestly, you really don't need to go anywhere else to eat! Our view and balcony was another perk! I HIGHLY recommend anyone to stay here, the rooms are huge too! Thank you for making me feel like "family"! We will be staying here from now on! Love love love Kimbery Hotel!

title: The employees make all the difference!
text: This review is long overdue as my family and I have been staying at the Kimberly at least once a year for the past ten years.  While the hotel is lovely, it is really the long time employees that make staying at the Kimberly an incredible experience.  Sadie at the front desk is able to take care of any and all issues that may come up and you've never had a warmer or more hospitable waiter as Arjan in the upstairs restaurant.  I am already looking forward to seeing them again next year!

title: Amazing experience
text: The Kimberly is like a home away from home. Wonderful location in midtown with an incredibly friendly staff. The breakfast on the penthouse level is a great way to start the day. Suites are very spacious and the living room has a pull out sofa bed that is actually comfortable. Highly recommend!

title: Good Place to Stay
text: The staff are competent and friendly, the rooms clean and well appointed and the neighborhood is quiet and attractive. The location is pretty central. It’s a good place to stay. It also has a very nice restaurant on the premises, which serves Italian food.

title: Awesome experience
text: Great trip to NYC!  Everyone loved this hotel. The room was perfect.  Great location.  Very friendly staff.  Will definitely come again!it’s very nice having 2 separate rooms.  The kids really liked the pull out couch and our bed was very comfortable.

title: Wonderful Stay
text: Wonderful stay. Room was extremely spacious, and the amenities were great. Really enjoyed the roof top bar as well. In close proximity to all the major attractions. Would definitely come back next Christmas holiday!

title: Perfect in all the ways!
text: Everything about this stay was perfect! Perfect location, perfect suite for family, separate room with two beds, a pull out couch and a rollaway. Little kitchen with dishes etc. everything we needed and staff was SO great. I never say this but can’t wait to stay here next time! Family of 6! Walking distance to Radio City, Times Square, Rockafeller, subway etc. best bagels around the corner at Ess- a-bagel.

title: Great location and friendly staff
text:
The hotel rooms where very comfortable the service was great and great location, the butlers where extremely friendly and the 2 restaurants that adjoin the hotel where excellent. 

Highly recommended

title: Awesome experience!
text: Lovely hotel! Housekeeping was amazing, MD and Claudio at the front desk were so very helpful with tips and directions and the door men were friendly. Great location close to everything and great restaurants in house. I will definitely return!

title: Love this hotel 🏨
text:
The absolute best hotel in NYC. I’ve been coming for 25 years and every time I’ve come it’s like family getting back together. The service, the rooms the restaurants are spectacular. 
I’ve stayed all over the world 🌎 and this is my favorite place ❤️

title: Perfect, highly recommend
text:
I travel a lot, been to New York City multiple times, and generally dont do reviews but this hotel deserves it.  

GREAT hotel, great service, great location, big rooms, reasonable prices.

Highly recommend this hotel for anyone.

title: Awesome weekend in NYC for the Holidays
text:
Awesome stay as Always at Kimberly 😍
Centrally located ,Tree 🎄 3blocks away !! Rooftop Restaurant has amazing views😳The Decor is like going to a fine hotel in Europe 😍Rooms are amazing for NYC  suites with balcony 😀. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE KIMBERLY!!

title: highly recommended
text: This is now our go to hotel in Manhattan. I can find nothing bad whatsoever to say about it. Accommodations are a great value for what you receive and the service (especially MD at the front desk) is exceptional. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: 10/10 would recommend this hotel!
text: This hotel was amazing! From the staff, to the decorations, to the amenities and the views… we had a wonderful time!! The doorman was great every time we came or left from the hotel. He made our 5 year old feel very special! We enjoyed the complimentary coffee and pastries at the Upstairs at the Kimberly.  I would highly recommend this hotel!

title: Kimberly Hotel. A perfect place to stay.
text: The Kimberly Hotel was absolutely amazing!! The staff was so courteous and friendly. MD went out of his was to accommodate us.  The rooms were so neat and absolutely stunning. We greatly enjoyed our stay.

title: A very nice surprise
text: The Kimberly is a great value.  Is the decor the most modern or elegant?  No, but it is clean and comfortable with all expected amenities, an excellent full breakfast included, and very helpful, friendly staff.

title: I’ll be back
text:
Great hotel, well located, plenty of restraint choices on site.  

I stayed a week and the Staff made it feel like home. MD at the desk was great!!

I’ll make this my home base on any future visits!

title: Cancelled stay at short notice
text:
I booked a suite in February 2023 for a 6 night stay over the new year for my daughter's 13th birthday.  
Woke up this morning to a e-mail saying that my stay had been cancelled due to incorrect room rate!!!  Absolute rubbish.  Clearly selling the room for more than what i had paid back in February.
I now have to book a last minute hotel at ridiculous rates.
I would not touch this place, shocking treatment of customers.

title: Feels like home.
text:
Very comfortable. Quiet. Great Location.
"Upstairs" restaurent was a delightful experience.
The staff were very accomodating.
The bed was very comfortable.  The shower was amazing.
The room was large.

title: Very comfortable hotel
text: Very nice stay, nice location, room was spacious and comfortable and well appointed, staff were very friendly and helpful.   Only issue was “water hammer” ( plumbing noise ) when using shower -reported to front desk.

title: Great home away from home in nyc
text: Great experience. Family of four, had a suite with king bed for adults, pull out sofa for kids in separate room. Mini Kitchen with settings for four, fridge, toaster and microwave so had breakfast (brought bagels and fixings and pop tarts) each morning to save money before heading out for the day. Great location in midtown. Would (and have) return.

title: A returning guests take
text: It’s family like in a big city. We were welcomed back and offered a wonderful suite that met our needs for relaxation and business. The room staff keep the rooms perfectly. The bell staff always exceed our expectations and with Harry, there is always some laughter around the corner as he loves his guests. I highly recommend The Kimberly

title: Great Stay in NYC
text: Wonderful boutique hotel in a great location. The staff were really friendly and helpful and the accommodations very comfortable. Lots of nice amenities as well. Perfect when staying with more than 2 people as the suites offer great privacy. Highly recommended!

title: Fantastic Hotel!
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Staff were all so welcoming and helpful.  Our room was fantastic.  The location was convenient to all we planned to do... easy walking distance to shop and to see the parade... subway stop just a block away.  We will definitely stay here again.

title: Thanksgiving in NYC!
text:
The environment and hospitality at the Kimberly is exceptional.  We enjoyed a wonderful Thanksgiving dinner at Bistango and the staff was excellent.  Kudos to the Chef and staff.
Thank you to everyone for making our Thanksgiving so special.

title: Perfection!
text: This is the second time we have stayed here and it was as perfect as the first time! Beds so comfortable, huge rooms, friendly and helpful staff. We will choose this hotel every time we go to NYC - and you should, too!

title: The visit was wonderful!!
text:
The room was gorgeous!! Having a doorman was awesome. Everyone there was polite and accommodating. I will definitely stay again when I return to NYC!
The only dark spot on the trip was the elevator breaking down twice forcing us to walk up seven flights of stairs.

title: Thanksgiving family trip
text:
Beyond amazing! Had a wonderful stay in a one bedroom suite with a balcony. Rooms were cleaned daily and bellhops were extremely courteous and on point. Had a drink at the Empire Steakhouse and bartender was friendly.
Convenient to everything and was able to experience all the attractions within a short walk.
Definitely worth the money.

title: A taste of New York.
text: Loved this boutique upscale hotel.    This is an older classic   Hotel l with luxury feel to it.  Doorman. Restaurant. Room service. Location is key.   Subway close by and you feel safe walking at night close to restaurants. Bars  lived staying here at a reasonable price

title: Favorite Boutique Hotel in NYC
text:
My Mom and I have stayed at the Kimberly every Thanksgiving since 2018 and always love it. Clean, well-appointed, fabulous service.  Can't say enough about how wonderful Sadie was to us - she upgraded our room and arrange for complimentary breakfast when I told her we were not comfortable in the room we had!
Sadie, we will be back next year!!

title: NYC with family!
text: The Kimberly Hotel did not disappoint. A hidden gem in midtown. Close to a subway, food and shops. So kid friendly. Gave us water bottles whenever we needed them. The best part is the spacious rooms. We are a family of 5 and having a separate living room is golden!

title: Simply superb. Stay here.
text: At this point in my life, I've probably stayed in at least 200 hotels around the world. Less than 10 were genuinely memorable experiences. The Kimberly in NYC was a welcome addition to that select club. The service, from the doormen to bell desk to check in and concierge, were at a level you would find at a hotel charging 3x the price. The room was lovely and well appointed, and even quiet by NY standards. We were in town with our high school aged kids for a tour of Columbia U., and they (a hard to impress duo) were very pleased as well. Will certainly return soon, next time without the kids, so we can enjoy the 21+ rooftop lounge and it's great view. Don't hesitate to stay here next time you are looking for a place in NYC. You won't regret it.

title: The place to be
text:
the place to be in east side... 
The always warm welcome, nice people and the home feeling in the years.
The sales team is outstanding 
the breakfast staff always with a smile and ready for any request
Thank you!

title: Definitely will stay here again.
text: The staff was amazing! I spoke to Dusty a few times and she was wonderful!  We were celebrating our anniversary! Dusty made it extra special! We wanted a hotel with frig/micro. We did the King suite-very clean, comfy bed. Recommendation better lighting.

title: Will happily stay again!
text: The rooms were enormous! I booked a room with 2 beds and a living room. It was the same cost as a single room with one bed at every other hotel in the area. Traveling with a friend I wanted us to have our own space. We were greeted warmly, given bottled water without requesting it and had a wonderful stay. The bed was so comfortable I slept better than I have in a very long time. The rooms and common areas were very clean. The subway is around the corner. No reason not to stay here.

title: Awesome stay Again!
text: The room was so pretty & the beds were so comfortable- left a treat in the fridge for my daughter, who’s birthday we were celebrating- the doorman was very helpful - 10/10 we will be back again! Love  the Kimberley

title: Awesome
text: The Hospitality is the best in the city. Hotel looks and feels clean and cozy.Room was well stocked and all we expected. My 5th stay and not my last. I am from the Caribbean and as soon as it warms up I will return.Food was good. Service excellent

title: Perfect get away
text: We always enjoy our stay at the Kimberly hotel. Convenient to everything!  Even though there was a marathon going on in the city, the staff was well prepared and organized. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Third time staying and we will be staying again for sure x
text: We love this wonderful hotel with friendly staff, very clean rooms, great facilities and so much space! We love the balconies for lots of fresh air, it’s our third visit and we will definitely come back thank you so much x thank you for making it so special for Mia & I x

title: Best Sheets Ever!!!!
text: The sheets are the very BEST!!!!   Staff friendly and very helpful.  Staff helped with restaurants, direction to walk and what to pass up.   Ready to go back again.  Surprised to see how unsophisticated the residents were.

title: Ask about the assigned room as they vary a lot
text: The room was clean but small and in a little disrepair. My room faced 50th Street and was noisy. My travel companion had a much nicer and quieter room. We paid the same price. The door people were friendly. A waiter in the top-floor restaurant went the extra mile to allow us to sit there when we got food from Essa Bagel instead of purchasing their breakfast (which didn't look all that good.)  Good location away from  Times Square.

title: We will most definitely return to the Kimberly!
text: Location, location, location!  Loved this place!  Stayed for 6 days, 5 nights.  We have previously stayed in Times Square but we're getting a bit old for that now!  Was so nice to stay in mid-town.  I cannot say enough about the doormen!  They were all so kind and helpful everyday.  Most things were within walking distance and when it wasn't or we were tired of walking, then we just grabbed a cab or Uber.  We chose the 1 bedroom suite with 2 bathrooms which was great.  This is a very dated hotel with very ornate furnishings but we loved it.  There are 2 elevators in this hotel and we never had to wait more than a minute for one.   Can't go wrong with this hotel.

title: Very confortable, calm and charming hotel, ideally situated, high level of service
text:
We spent 3 nights in this charming hotel in September 2023.
This hotel is ideally situated, within easy walking distance to Time Square, 5th Avenue, Madison Avenue, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, MOMA museum, etc. The subway station is 25 yards away, fast for downtown visits: Statue of Liberty, Wall Street, Brooklyn bridge, World Trade Center, etc…
The hotel is calm, very clean and confortable, with excellent bed and choice of pillows. The staff, from doormen to management are very welcoming,helpful and offer a high level of service.
There are 2 restaurants on the ground floor: the Empire steakhouse has a lot of character and a lively cocktail bar. The other restaurant offers good Italian food. Breakfast is served in the penthouse, good views and good choice of food.
We will certainly come back to the Kimberly hotel on our next visit to New York City!

title: Spacious and clean room.
text: Lovely hotel, friendly and helpful staff.  Beds including the pull out were very comfortable. We all slept well. Excellent location. Lots of restaurants nearby. Rooftop lounge was pricey but a lot of fun. Walking distance to Grand Central Station, Empire State Building, The Summit, Rockefeller Center, Times Square. Radio City Music Hall, Theater District the UN and 34th Street ferry terminal. We got a suite which was very spacious. Very clean room. I would stay with my family again.

title: Elated to have found this gem
text: Crisp soft sheets, fantastic shower pressure, great location, clean lobby and room. Excellent sized space with beautiful  furnishings. Separate living room and small kitchenette area. The bathroom was luxuriously appointed but a tiny size, normal for NYC. All staff friendly and helpful. When they found out it was my birthday when my husband asked where to buy flowers, they sent up a complimentary surprise. We will definitely stay here again!!!!!

title: Perfect stay
text: This will now be our go to hotel when visiting. The hotel is in a good location with lots of restaurants and shops, the hotel itself has a restaurant, rooftop bar and all the amenities. The room itself was so spacious and very comfortable beds. The staff was very friendly as well.

title: Great stay in NYC
text: The hotel exceeded our expectations.  Room was exactly like the pictures, comfortable and spacious. The location is great - walking distance to everything.  The penthouse lounge was very nice and having Ess-a-bagel around the corner was a real bonus

title: Best Hotel in NYC
text: A good hotel has everything in order when you arrive, a great hotel takes a problem and does everything to make it right. The Kimberly went above and beyond to make us happy was their top priority, so thank you Kimberly Hotel for making us so welcome in NYC, super helpful staff Specially Harry, MD and others, friendly warm Upstair bar and excellent location, stay here, you will love it.

title: Awesome family trip to NYC!
text: just fantastic! location, views, rooftop bar and patio were awesome. The luxury suite was huge for NYC and so comfy. Even the pull out for the kids was super comfortable. The kitchenette came in so handy for heating up leftovers too. We even got upgraded for my husband’s birthday to a room with balcony and great view! They sent him wine and a cheese tray too. The very kind staff offered the kids snacks and bear keychains and each staff member couldn’t have been nicer. We can’t wait to go back and will never stay anywhere else while in mid-town. We were sad to leave!

title: Always enjoy the Kimberly.
text: We always enjoy staying at the Kimberly.  Great location and great service.  The rooms are spacious and well maintained.  The doorman was very helpful in arranging transportation for five to the airport.

title: Gorgeous Hotel
text: We’ve stayed here four times ! This hotel is gorgeous.  Great location - walkable for everything!!!   Service  is impeccable. We will return whenever we go to New York! We will not  look anywhere else!

title: Great stay in the Big Apple.
text: The rooms are spacious and comfortable,  location is great and the staff is very friendly and professional. Am definitely coming back. We loved how personable they were and the rooftop bar was an added treat. Beautiful view of Hudson at sunset.

title: Luxurious and Perfect Hotel in Midtown
text:
What an incredible hotel. It is not cheap, but if you want extreme luxury and impeccable service, this is the hotel for you. It is located on 50th St. near Lexington Ave., a fine location in Midtown and close to multiple subway lines.

Our suite has a large (30' x 14') living room which includes a small kitchenette (with a fridge, microwave, and even a dishwasher), and a slightly smaller bedroom with two queen beds. The small bathroom has a bath/shower combination. 

The lobby is spacious and pleasant, with a huge aquarium full of dozens of live tropical fish and sea creatures.

There is valet parking for $55 and multiple restaurants in the building as well as numerous restaurants within a block. 

Hotel staff is low-key, but friendly and helpful for whatever you ask for. There is a doorman and a concierge. 

In short, if you have the money and want the best New York City has to offer, this is your hotel.

title: Five Star Customer Service
text: Customer service was outstanding from check in to check out. The location is outstanding and  the rooms are always clean. We look forward to our next trip to New York City and will book here again in the future.

title: Superb Hotel
text: Great stay, friendly, spacious room with balcony, pull out sofa very comfortable, Location super handy to all sights. Ess a bagel around corner, as well as fruit stand and convenience stores. Staffs were amazing specially MD from Desk and helped me lot to make our stay enjoyable and will be back soon.

title: Wonderful weekend!
text: I had a wonderful stay at the Kimberly Hotel this past weekend! The hotel is beautiful, and the location is superb! The room is spacious, clean, and fully equipped. It had an "old charming NY style". Bed is super comfy, I had a great night sleep! I also loved the rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the city and where we had delicious breakfast and drinks with music at night. The staff was definitely a highlight of my staff. Everyone is so genuine and friendly. Shout-out to MD and Klaudio at the Front Desk who were always so nice and willing to help, the bellmen who were very attentive, Ari (sp?) from Albania during breakfast time at the rooftop restaurant who provided an excellent service! Thank you all for an amazing weekend!

title: Another awesome stay!!
text: Very professional staff; location is superb, rooms are large, beds are luxuriously comfortable, Upstairs lounge has awesome views, wines are superb, Arian watches over his guests in the morning, the manager in evening is awesome, they run a top notch show! We stay at least once a year, sometimes twice.

title: Best room and best service! We will be back!
text: From the minute we arrived, everything here was great. We LOVED the doormen, who made us feel safe and welcomed every time we entered. There were 3 of us, all women, staying in one room. We chose a king bed and foldout sofa, which was also very comfortable. We liked the terrace, too! It was so nice to have so much space, which is rare in NYC. The bathroom was smallish, but very nicely outfitted. We also used and enjoyed the coffee maker, toaster, microwave and fridge! Housekeeping was great, too. My only complaint was the rooftop bar would not let us come in with a 19 year old, even though food is served there. We could enter the bar in the restaurant downstairs, which was confounding to us. The rooftop bar also had a rule against sneakers, which I thought was ridiculous, given that my party’s shoes that day consisted of Golden Goose and Gucci. Oh, well! We left that behind and didn’t miss it one bit! Everything else was above and beyond, especially the service. So comfortable. We will be back.

title: A beautiful hotel.
text: The Kimberly is an elegant hotel holding on to the Victorian era. Wonderfully helpful staff and bellman. Our room was large with double sinks and a soaker tub. We felt very safe with absolutely no issues. The location is great for getting around Manhattan, Central Park, Time Square, Park Ave and 5th Ave. Only took taxis to go south.

title: Really enjoyed our stay there.
text: Staff , location, bed quality and comfort, wifi in rooms, ambience all outstanding. We especially enjoyed the Bistango restaurant on ground floor and upstairs bar.  The room we had could have had better access to charging devices, as only wall plugs were available, with no USB stations. The bathroom was small and as a older couple, we found the small bathtub to be alittle too tall with a curved, rather slick bottom, so for us, this made our showers rather challenging because  we had to be very careful getting in and out of the tub or turning around in the shower. There was a handicap bar but I found it difficult to wash and rinse my hair regardless of the very nice  (handheld) shower head option.

title: Another great Kimberly visit !
text:
I’m not sure how many times I’ve stayed at the Kimberly - I’ve happily lost count. 
The service never fails - the most professional and welcoming front desk staff and that follows through to the doormen and restaurant staff. Just the best ! Looking forward to my next visit !

title: Great place with large rooms.
text: I’ve stayed at the Kimberly several times over the years. I enjoy the space provided with the suites. I requested a balcony and thankfully was provided one. Again, even more space - which is at a premium in NYC. The beds are comfortable, the room is tidy - and all of the staff are helpful.

title: Bad bath
text:
The room was fantastic (28E), but the bathroom wasn’t made for someone 6’2” and 250 lbs. The porcelain tub was very very narrow, with no bath mat provided ( a slip snd fall nightmare); the lav faucet protruded out about 1 inch from the sink top - making it nearly impossible to put your hands under it to get a good wash. Finally, the commode was like sitting on the floor…very very low to the ground. 

Otherwise, it was excellent.

title: Guest Services is Exceptional!
text: My husband booked the Executive Suite at the Kimberly Hotel as a birthday present. It was a Fabulous experience! First let me say what separates this boutique hotel from so many others I often stay at for work, is the Guest Services Staff. Especially, MD, THE Guest Services Guy who was exceptional!  From the moment we checked in they were attentive to our every need. They offered valet parking which was a bonus. They got us a dinner reservation at the last minute. And a highlight was the suite. Gorgeous with old world charm and a balcony!  Don't see that in NYC often. The bed was luxurious. I fell in LOVE with the comforter, so much so, that I Need it in my life. I asked MD where I could buy one and he went out of his way to arrange for housekeeping to get me one on a Sunday to purchase. I feel he really went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. Such a special place. We will be back!

title: Great time!  Great location!
text: Great clean hotel in the middle of everything but not too crazy.  Will definitely be coming back.  Hotel was perfectly situated between multiple subway stations with quick access to every corner of the city.  Front desk staff was great and so were the bellman

title: Girls weekend.
text: Our stay at the Kimberly was amazing. The room was very clean and well attended to. The staff was fabulous. The location was great. Close enough to Time Square. I look forward to our next stay. Thank you!

title: The best gem in midtown
text:
Could not be happier with this hotel. First time here- read the reviews which were accurate and glowing. The staff is wonderful. The room is enormous by NYC standards and by most standards 
Huge living room, patio, comfortable bed, 2 sinks, good makeup area, great kitchenette 
Absolutely love this hotel and will definitely come back! Added bonus is it’s .5 mile walk to my best friend 
Almost forgot The rooftop bar is awesome

title: The Kimberly Hotel is st the top of my list!
text: This was the most gracious hotel I’ve stayed in while in NYC. All the staff are attentive, helpful and kind. The rooms are  very comfortable, well appointed and well equipped. It was a step back to the hotel experience of the past: the doorman who hands you an umbrella for your walk in the rain. The same doorman who teaches your grandchild the “Kimberly Handshake.” The writing paper in the desk. The amazingly lush and comfortable bed and pillows.  And a fridge and microwave too. And then there is the rooftop bar, where you can also make yourself a cup of afternoon tea, or enjoy a breakfast buffet while you enjoy the view.

title: Great Stay
text: The rooms were beautiful and clean. For us the location was perfect. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The concierge was very helpful with directions and places to eat. The Bellmen were also helpful in hailing taxis. We will return soon.

title: Stay at The Kimberly
text: The Kimberly is a charming boutique hotel conveniently located in the midtown east area of Manhattan at 50th and 3rd Ave. We visited the Upstairs rooftop bar several years ago and said when we go back - this is where we stay! We celebrated my husband's 65th birthday and our recent retirement. Customer service was excellent. Lunch, Dinner and the Upstairs appetizer options were all delicious and the servers were top-notch. Our suite was spacious and the balcony was a special treat. Did I mention the best-ever bed linens? We will definitely be back for our next visit to New York.

title: Highly Recommend
text: Had a lovely stay at the Kimberly Hotel.  From the moment of getting dropped off, everyone was so friendly and professional.   My room was ready early too!   I reserved a one bedroom suite.  It’s such a huge space, especially for NYC.  The bed was extremely comfortable.  Would definitely stay again.  Highly recommend.  Oh… also enjoyed a glass of wine on the rooftop bar.  Only wish I had a longer trip 😊

title: TOP TIER HOTEL!
text: TOP TIER!  Couldn't have booked a better hotel!  Location was perfect, staff was EXCELLENT and our room was beautiful and comfortable.  We will definitely stay here again and again! The steak restaurant is gorgeous and the staff was great also.  Same can be said of the Italian restaurant!  We enjoyed Upstairs at the Kimberly!  Great food and the view is tremendous!

title: A must stay at boutique hotel when visiting NYC.
text:
I have never  stayed at The Kimberly before so didn’t know what to expect. My stay exceeded any expectations I may have had for this business trip. For a few days it felt like a home away from home. The staff was attentive, the decor was well designed with a warm cozy feel and not sterile ultra modern environments that remind you are away from your loved ones. 

The Bistango restaurant downstairs was wonderful and I loved their unique variations of Italian classics. The lightly fried fresh burrata was so tasty  and the prociutto  topped Italian flatbread was the perfect food after a long day. 

The rooms were spacious and the views of the city at night are breathtaking. I was attending an evening at their rooftop lounge, and the service was great. The Kimberly runs a well managed hotel and I would encourage anyone staying in NYC to book at this boutique hotel over the usual hotel chains. I know I will next trip.

title: Classic Grand Hotel
text: This is a classic, grand hotel that makes you feel right at home the moment you step into the lobby.  If you upgrade to the suite, it feels like you have your own apartment right in the city.  The staff was excellent and I loved my stay.

title: When can we return?
text: It's our favorite place to stay in Manhattan.  It has been for 20 years.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  Great location.  The hospitality of the staff alone is enough to keep us coming back.  It was great to see Jose and Ralph.  Happy retirement Gregory!

title: The Kimberly always delivers!!!
text: The Kimberly never fails to please. It has become my home away from home whenever I am in NY for business or pleasure. Great spacious rooms, super welcoming staff everywhere. Upstairs for breakfast or coffee is excellent. Located is great. Go for the one bedroom.

title: Perfect stay in every aspect
text: The staff, the room, the professionalism was all above expectations.  This stay became an oasis in a very hectic travel stretch. The front desk was exceptionally kind to my children. Could not have been more pleased.

title: Elegant Hotel and Excellent Service
text:
The Kimberly is beautiful hotel and our room (2 bedroom suite) was very spacious and well appointed.  
We had fantastic city views and it is an ideal location near two subway stops.
The staff were friendly and very responsive to multiple requests for more towels and coffee supplies.
We did eat at the penthouse restaurant upon arrival and it was okay but no nothing special.

title: A wonderful week at the Kimberly
text:
A spectacular place to stay with a family. Having a 1BR apartment in midtown Manhattan for a week was the perfect way to vacation in NYC. The staff was incredibly helpful, the room was spacious (we're a family of five) and the beds were comfortable. 

The breakfasts were great, the rooftop bar and restaurant was a treat and we really enjoyed the Italian restaurant one night. 

We give it top marks as we felt at home for our entire stay.

title: Centrally located
text: Staff is very friendly and helpful. Room with two double beds is of decent size.  I had to check out early, so didn't get to enjoy the hotel facilities or restaurants as I would have liked. Located on 50th and 3rd Ave, the subway station is a few steps from hotel.

title: Amazing Weekend in NYC at the Kimberly
text:
We stayed at the Kimberly for two nights and we're so happy we stayed there. After looking at A LOT of Midtown hotels and trying to find one with an amazing view from a balcony, this is the one.

Location: A+! 6 train takes you downtown or uptown a half block away.

Room: A! Balcony view was amazing. Living room, huge bathroom, great shower, comfortable mattress, etc. We were fortunate to be placed in room 29F and it was what we were hoping for! The AC unit was loud and no furniture on balcony, but the only reasons to knock from perfection.

Hotel Facility: NA! We didn't visit the Upstairs rooftop bar besides to check it out quick. The lobby was beautiful. One elevator was out so it was interesting riding the service elevator with staff, but they were very kind about it.

From reservations to check-in to a surprise for our anniversary, everything was perfect and everyone was exemplary. Top notch customer service.

Thank you to all of the staff for treating us so well during our stay. We'll have lasting memories of our stay in The City.

title: Luxury One Bedroom Suite - King
text: Spacious and well cleaned room with balcony. On roof top is a bar with foldable top so you can enjoy your breakfast or evening visit under open with beautiful view. On the loby level there is beatiful round aquarim and restaurant .All staff that we encountered were extremly polite , and for any of our requirements or needs they responded and arranged  in short time. Highly recommanded for family visit

title: I love the Kimberly!!!!
text: Everything is perfect in this hotel, which is perfectly located and has also excellent restaurants in case you do not want to go to far for having a delicious meal. Further to that, everything was very good as  the bed, the bathroom the quality of the toilet products and the kindness of everybody who works there. I really enjoyed my stay.

title: Great Experience!
text: I, like so many others in New York on September 9, 2023, had my flight cancelled so I needed a hotel for the night. All the hotels near the airports were full so I decided to look at the Kimberly Hotel that I had walked by the night before. I am so glad I did! The room was great, and the staff was outstanding. The Empire Steakhouse next door was also a great place for dinner! I will definitely go back to the Kimberly Hotel!

title: Quality comfort in the heart of New York
text: Loved the location; we walked to Broadway each night of our stay. The room was very comfortable with beautiful decor. The staff was very welcoming and attentive. I will stay here again when I visit New York

title: NYC Get Away
text: The Hotel is amazing. Great Front Desk Staff and Bell Man. The rooms are big and luxurious. Classic NYC decor. The location is amazing. We are from Mexico and any information or reservations that we needed were quickly handled by everyone.

title: A Gem!
text: The Kimberly is a diamond in the rough!  Amazing staff and amazing amenities.  The restaurants are good, the facilities are great and the staff!  Amazing!  Jose and Peter both made our stay amazing.  I would recommend the Kimberly for anyone staying in New York.  Felt like staying in a small town boutique hotel in a large city!

title: Love this hotel. Only wished the elevators were more efficient and cleaner.  Perfect location!
text: We stayed here for US Open and it was perfect! The suite was comfortable, clean and nicely appointed. Staff are friendly and very helpful. Perfect location for pretty much anything— great area in NYC! Restaurants are walking distance— recommend one across the street if looking for Indian cuisine.

title: Chambre très bruyante
text:
Chambre très grande, parfaitement équipée pour un séjour de 10 jours en famille, et personnel très professionnel.

Malheureusement, l'environnement de l'hôtel est très bruyant. 
Les systèmes de ventilation des immeubles environnants font un bruit permanent incroyable, et les fenêtres vétustes de la chambre ne filtrent pas du tout ces bruits (et nous étions pourtant au 26ème étage).

title: NYC for US OPEN
text: Great location! What a wonderful place to stay.. classic … beautiful and clean.. loved everything about The Kimberly! My son and I were in town for the US Open and we met several other guest during our stay.  Valet, front desk and concierge were so friendly and helpful.  You will love your stay here.. we did!

title: No more
text: We lived in a clean room, but there was a constant noise from some devices downstairs by the windows. It was like an airport or a shuttle launch. Considering the price, Frank Sinatra would have to sing to us every morning to make us happy. We're not coming back

title: A PERFECT 10 !!
text: The Kimberly exceeded our expectations!! The location was perfect, the suite gorgeous, the bedding so comfortable, and the staff friendly and knowledgeable!! It doesn’t get any better than this perfect 10 !!

title: Un po' usato, né consigliato, né sconsigliato
text: I punti forti sono la posizione strategica e il personale. La camera stessa era abbastanza grande per NYC, ma avrà visto giorni migliori, e questo tanti anni fa. L'unico vero problema era l'aria condizionata: non funzionava (magari perché era proprio afosissimo in quei giorni) ma faceva un rumore quanto un furgone. Per questo prezzo e con un po' di creatività, si può trovare di meglio, anche in zona.

title: Excellent Staff
text:
There was a small mix-up with the reservation, the staff told us to have a complimentary coffee and pastry while it was sorted, when we returned the room was upgraded to a suite.  The staff could not have been nicer and more professional.
Breakfast was lovely, in a nice setting and again the staff was friendly, helpful and lovely.
I would stay again, given the location, the staff and the space.

title: The Kimberly Hotel is MUST when visiting NYC!
text: PHENOMENAL EXPERIENCE! I am a weekly guest here to receive medical treatment at a nearby hospital, and every stay here has been delightful! The staff at the Kimberly is amazing! Crystal in Reservations, Arian and Sophia at Upstairs, Ralph the Doorman, and the staff at the front desk, are simply Wonderful! The accommodations are spacious and extremely clean and comfortable! The beds are so comfortable that you do not want to get up in the morning! The Upstairs rooftop restaurant/lounge is is FANTASTIC! With beautiful views and excellent service! The value that you receive at the Kimberly is unmatched. I highly recommend the Kimberly hotel to anyone who is planning to stay in the city, whether it be overnight or for longer stay! The Kimberly hotel is a must when visiting NYC!

title: First class Hotel with accommodating and awesome staff!
text:
The Kimberly staff were so helpful and nice. I will definitely stay there again on my next trip to NYC. I enjoyed my 1 bedroom suite which had a balcony and a small kitchen.
The Rooftop had a good breakfast buffet (which was extra). The location was very convenient with plenty of restaurants nearby including the amazing “Spice Symphony” directly across the street. I was able to walk to the theater as well  as Rockefeller Center. All in all, an excellent hotel!

title: Excellent for family trip to NYC
text:
Our family stayed at The Kimberly for four nights at the beginning of August. Upon arrival, we received very attentive service from the doormen and porters who took our luggage into the hotel while we dealt with the taxi driver and then reception for check-in. They would always greet and open doors for us during our stay, always happy to answers question or just chat. Not used to such white glove old school New York service, it definitely added to the hotel's charms.

Early check-in wasn't an option, so we left our luggage and went out for the day. The hotel said they would notify me when the room was ready. While we were out, I missed their call but they didn't leave a voicemail or text me, so I had to call back to confirm the room was ready.

We were pleased with our very spacious and clean one bedroom suite with separate living area and sofa bed. It was nice not to be on top of each other and we felt very comfortable. There was also plenty of drawers and closet space, more than enough for four people. We also took full advantage of the kitchenette (fridge, microwave, toaster, sink, plate, glasses, cutlery), purchasing bagels and cream cheese from Essa-A-Bagel and other groceries for breakfast and snacks from Trader Joe's. I did go to the Starbucks down the street for coffee too impatient to try figuring out the coffee machine but my husband used it a few times.

To address some of the issues from other reviews, we did have one bathroom sink that drained slowly. Probably needed some Draino, we didn't think this was a big deal. We liked the toiletries provided, plus Plackers, bandaids, ear plugs, etc., and that housekeeping provided clean towels everyday if we needed them. For some reason, no matter how many times I changed the AC temperature, it would revert back to super cold. My family didn't mind because it was very hot in New York during our stay so I gave up. 

We also found you need super human strength to open the balcony door. It's old and heavy. I had requested balcony furniture online and over the phone, so was disappointed not see it set up upon arrival. Housekeeping was happy to bring it up when I called, but sent two guys to set up a small table and two folding chairs who we had to tip. We faced the building next door (where people slept in full view with their shades open) but still enjoyed sitting out there if we could the door open.

The hotel is in a safe area with plenty of stores and restaurants nearby. I agree it's close to attractions but when you have RA like me and it's blazing hot outside, places feel farther to get to. I would say it took us 15 minutes to walk to Bryant Park and 20-25 minutes to get to Times Square. However, the subway is five minutes away and we used it frequently.

Only my husband went to the rooftop lounge to check it out and he said the staff were not very welcoming when it was clear he wouldn't be paying for anything and just wanted to look around. They serve free pastries and coffee upstairs for guests during set times.

Overall, an excellent stay with lovely staff and only some minor grievances. I definitely recommend the hotel if space and access to a kitchen is important.

title: Absolutely fabulous! A must stay
text: I can’t say enough good things about The Kimberly Hotel! The staff was wonderful and so kind; I’ve honestly never had better a better experience at any other hotel. The hotel was gorgeous and extremely clean. Everything from linens to toiletries was top of the line. We have found our new hotel for when we return to New York

title: Recommend
text:
A very lovely hotel in NYC. 
We stayed as a family of four including two teenagers. Room was massive - with a separate living room with fold out bed. Lots of room and space. 
Staff all incredibly helpful and friendly. Free water whenever we needed it. 
Very clean. Lovely kitchenette. 
Nice breakfasts on the top floor. 
Free pastries and coffee 11-4

title: Lived up to the hype
text: Stayed here for 2 nights and it was an excellent stay. The location is fantastic - very easy walking distance to many major tourist sights, but also close to the subway. There is definitely street noise, but it can't be helped in New York. We really loved this place. On the one hand it has a classic, old school, retro decor, but it doesn't feel old and dated - everything is in good repair. Our suite had a small kitchen area and living room, with a separate king bedroom. The linens were lovely, and robes/Nespresso machine were provided. Toiletries provided were an upscale brand. People at the front desk were friendly and kind. If I had to find fault, the lock on the door to the balcony was broken, and the bedroom door could not close all the way (the door seemed just a touch too big for the frame). We had a great stay and would not hesitate to return here; in fact, I can't imagine staying anywhere else if I return to New York.

title: Nice hotel but problems with our reservation
text:
Booked online directly through the hotel’s website.  Never got an email confirmation but had the reservation details printed just in case (sure glad I did).  Emailed the hotel a few days before our arrival to make sure everything was fine. Got a computer generated reply with a different reservation number, wrong number of guests and more expensive nightly rates.  After pointing this out, and many back and forth exchanges, all of which were answered by the hotel reservation department in the most terse manner (no proper salutation/greetings, acknowledgment of their mistake or reassurance that they would fix the problem), was finally told that a manager would look into it. Was left under the impression that nobody really took time to read the email and attached documentation (i.e copy of my initial reservation details) and was left feeling like I was begging for a rebate whereas I only wanted to hotel to respect the initial terms of the reservation.  In the end, received no apologies for the mistake, simply another computer generated confirmation with the right price this time, but the incorrect number of guests (one adult instead of 2 + child).  Was a little worried that this would be a problem once we got to the hotel (it turned out front desk staff was very accommodating), but just did not feel like wasting more time of my precious vacation arguing or looking for a different place. 
 
While the hotel experience in itself was really nice (we had the luxury one bedroom suite which was comfortable and very spacious) and the service provided on site was impeccable, I would be hesitant to return given how poorly my reservation was handled pre-arrival.

title: Amazing Time at the Kimberly Hotel
text: My stay at the Kimberly Hotel was from August 12th to August 13th. My stay there was excellent and the staff at Kimberly always treat me with such kindness. The Upstairs at the Kimberly is simply amazing views of Midtown Manhattan especially when the rooftop is open up. It is such a fun atmosphere and I truly love it. This is my 3rd time coming here during the month of August and each time I had a great time. I would strongly recommend someone staying at the Kimberly Hotel.

title: The best sleep and customer service
text: The BED is so comfortable. Nothing like having a good night sleep away from home. Customer service from all aspect top notch. Recommend to anyone traveling to Manhattan area. The roof top bar is nice and laid back with smoking section for the traveling smokers!!!

title: Excellent NYC Stay!
text: Best stay we've had in NYC! From the spacious suite with the comfy beds (even the sofa bed was nice!) to the well appointed mini bar to cocktails at the Upstairs rooftop bar, we've thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

title: Birthday Celebration
text: We brought our 16 year old to NYC to celebrate his birthday. They let us check in early. All of the staff was friendly, professional, and accommodating. The room was beautiful. Bonus balcony and jet tub jacuzzi. Will definitely be back

title: Great visit to see old friends. .
text: This is our go to hotel in Manhattan. Center location. Large rooms and great staff to assist in any way possible to make your visit to NYC memorable.
