Just a block away from 2nd and 3rd where you can fine dinning options everywhere. PJ Clark’s is one of our favorites. Enjoy the city. It is the best!!!

title: Absolutely fabulous! Coming back to this one for sure!
text: The Kimberly Hotel property is the BEST! I just returned from a quick 4 day weekend trip and I absolutely loved everything about this place ! The staff is super friendly from the front desk to the front door to the servers at their rooftop to the staff that take care of the rooms.  My room was clean and spacious and so comfortable! I booked the one bedroom king suite. We had plenty of space and the furnishings were beautiful. I did my homework and read the reviews of guests that came before me and I will tell you I am always a little suspicious when there are too many good things being said… BUT in the case of The Kimberly… it is ALL 💯 % true!  I will definitely be booking any future stays in NYC at The Kimberly.  The location is great … on the upper East side close to great food and only a few blocks from the beautiful St Patrick’s Cathedral and an easy 15 min walk to Times Square ! Thank you to The Kimberly staff for making my summer NYC trip so awesome!

title: Faultless few days
text: We stayed at the Kimberley Hotel for 3 nights as part of an East Coast tour from the UK. We can’t fault this gem of a hotel right in the mix of midtown Manhattan. Classic and very attentive. Really helpful staff throughout. A bit of confusion about our suite at check in, our agent’s fault not the hotel’s, but they dealt with it brilliantly. Nothing was too much trouble. Room service was prompt and the food was great. The roof top terrace was a lovely hideaway for a sunset cocktail. If you want modern fittings and fixtures then maybe not for you but if you’re happy with classic decor and great personal service for a reasonable price then the Kimberley is perfect!

title: Wonderful
text: The hotel is beautiful with excellent rooms and a fantastic, welcoming staff. Perfect for walking to a variety of places and made our trip for the weekend memorable. Would definitely check this hotel for our next trip back to NYC!

title: Love this place!
text: Great location, beautifully appointed rooms, wonderful rooftop restaurant, and such friendly staff! The maid service was perfect. A good value for the  price point.    Next time we come to NYC, we will stay here again!

title: The Best Hotel in NYC!! The accommodations are second to none.
text:
The Hotel Kimberly is absolutely phenomenal. I regularly travel for work and book Marriott properties almost exclusively. We planned this vacation at the last minute and decided to stay here based on a recommendation from a friend. I could not have been any happier with the accommodations. The room was wonderful, the bed was incredibly comfortable, the decor was spectacular the water pressure was incredible and the air condition kept the room at the perfect temperature. I loved the size of the rooms, the location of the property, the roof top bar and most importantly the friendliness of everyone employee we encountered. 

Don’t give it a second thought …………this is the hotel to book when you are visiting NYC. I highly recommend staying at this property. We will definitely be back again and again.

title: 50th birthday
text: We found the Kimberly a couple of years ago in our search to stay in the city. We loved it so much that we said when we go back, this is where we’re staying we upgraded to a bigger room this time and the stay was better than our first time, the hotel is clean the rooms are fantastic. The beds are comfortable and the rooftop bar is amazing. We highly recommend the Kimberly if you’re going to be spending the night in Manhattan.

title: Great hotel in New York City
text: Absolutely loved this hotel!  Not only was it close to my office and some fabulous restaurants but the staff went out of their way to make my stay smooth.  The room was impeccable- spacious and had everything and more than I needed.  I will absolutely be going back

title: Amazing stay in NYC
text: The Kimberly Hotel was an amazing place.  It has that high class old style New York feel for a great price.  Our room was awesome (1 bedroom suite).  It fit the four of us perfectly and was right in the heart of NYC.  It was clean, comfortable and had a balcony.  We would definitely recommend staying here.  Check in was easy, the bell hops took great care of our luggage and car and were extremely helpful.  The food we had at the hotel was also very good.  We will be back

title: A MUST STAY HOTEL!!
text:
Our stay at the Kimberly Hotel was fabulous! I can't get over how friendly the staff was. I have stayed in hotels all over the world, and the Kimberly Hotel staff is above the rest. From check-in to check-out, they went out of their way to make our stay perfect.

As far as location, the area was perfect. We felt very safe in the neighborhood, and it was walking distance to Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, and St. Patrick’s Cathedral.

The room was immaculate and had a ton of amenities.

If you are looking for a hotel in Manhattan away from the chaos, this is the hotel for you. I can't wait to come back!

title: Ótima escolha
text:
Excelente localização, perto de metrô, farmácias e bons restaurantes. 
Quarto espaçoso e limpo. Funcionários muito atenciosos, especialmente o doorman Harry, que é incrível e muito gentil, inclusive com as crianças! 

Café da manhã é bom mas poderia ter mais variedade de frutas.

title: Une équipe extraordinaire !
text: Nous sommes arrivés à l’hôtel en oubliant dans le taxi le sac à dos et le portable de mon fils de 9 ans…imaginez sa déception. Toute l’équipe de l’hôtel a été incroyable de gentillesse. Nous avons pu récupérer les affaires et nous avons même été surclassés ! Merci encore pour tout au Général Manager et à toute son équipe.

title: Absolutely best hotel in NYC
text: We stayed here in July with our family and had two of their balcony suites. Both rooms were stunning! Very clean and well decorated and appointed. The beds were so comfortable and housekeeping were efficient and so very nice. All the hotel personnel were friendly and the doormen remembered our names. HIGHLY recommend this hotel if you like quality, security, and special touches in your rooms. Will absolutely return for our next stay.

title: Perfection
text: The suite was magnificent! Absolutely immaculate. The service was top notch! We absolutely will be back! The location is also perfect. You can easily walk everywhere! Valet parking was also very reasonable for the location. The Empire Steak House is fabulous and we thoroughly enjoyed our dinner! Thank you again!

title: Great hotel
text:
The Kimberly never disappoints The staff couldn’t be more delightful From the valet to housekeeping and everyone in between
The cleanliness is consistently fabulous 
Have stayed here many times over the years and will definitely will be returning on or next visit to New York
One of our rooms this visit was not smoke free and that was a tad upsetting but that was the 1st time ever

title: Amazing place - great location!!
text: We traveled with another family and did all the things! We absolutely loved our stay at The Kimberly Hotel. Everyone and every part of it was amazing, especially the doorman. The staff was extremely helpful and kind. The rooftop was amazing for breakfast in the morning and cocktails at night. We also had an amazing dinner at the steakhouse. We will return!

title: Weekend away with the hubby
text:
Best service ever!  Huge room and a great rooftop bar/ breakfast buffet. 
There was always someone at the door to greet us and help with directions or Uber service. 
The maid service was on point. The location was perfect for all of our New York experiences. We will definitely be back.

title: Elegant hotel; great staff
text: We enjoyed a weekend stay at The Kimberly. From check in through check out, we received great and friendly service from the staff. The rooftop bar / restaurant is a must visit with a beautiful view of the city including the top of the Chrysler building. Our room was large and well appointed with great furnishings, and a variety of self service coffees and teas. The hotel is very convenient to transportation and Central Park is relatively close by. I heartily recommend the hotel.

title: Wonderful hotel for a family
text: A wonderful experience!  We will certainly book again!  We are a family of 5, and the room was spacious and perfectly laid out for our needs.  Microwave and refrigerator in the kitchen were so helpful with young kids.  Both the king bed and the pull out couch were comfortable!  The elevator is fast, the roof top bar/restaurant is absolutely lovely, and the staff is all so upbeat and happy!  Harry the doorman taught my girls a secret handshake and let them go around in the the revolving doors as many times as they liked.  The location is excellent for sightseeing.  I will say, the hotel furniture and carpet is a little dated, but it added to the classic beauty of this hotel.  Great experience, and we will return to the Kimberley again!

title: Elegant Lady
text: I have stayed at this hotel a number of times (either on my own reservation or that of a family member) and never once have I had anything less than a  great experience. On this June visit, I would like to give a shout out to MD at the front desk. The room we booked didn’t have a good layout for our needs on this particular stay so he offered us a change and made sure we had the best room for this trip. A big “thank you” to him for the great, no hassle customer service. Our new room was comfortable for us and the balcony with a view (we had a high floor) was nice. You can request balcony furniture if you’d like to spend much time sitting out there. The beds (including the generously sized pull out sofa beds) are comfy and the rooms have plenty of closet space. It’s great to wake up and enjoy a cup of coffee, easily brewed in room and a NYT delivered to your door all while lounging in one of their comfy robes. The doormen are helpful, friendly and upbeat, and the housekeeping staff accommodated our request for extra towels and added bath products. This is not a new hotel and some of the furnishings could use a bit of a spiff up, but it’s a well located, elegant lady of a hotel where staff wants your stay to be as comfortable as possible.  Try Upstairs at the Kimberley for a light filled breakfast experience. Tip: we usually hit the bar at Empire Steakhouse on day 1 to sip a happy hour cocktail, make a toast to NY, and settle in for another great stay at The Kimberly.

title: Awesome stay at the Kimberly Hotel
text: Would love to thank and appreciate staff at the Kimberly Hotel. Upon arrival we were greeted by Mark who took our luggage and made sure our vehicle went to valet. Dusty at the front desk was wonderful in getting us checked in and properly settled in. Awesome kudos go to Johely who we met upstairs. My wife and I connected on her in a personal level that is unheard of in our industry. She made us feel at home and at peace. I don’t have enough good words to describe how magnificent she is. We thank you Johely. Milan at Bistango was great.and felt like at home while having a great meal there. Arian in the morning is superb. Bus service was impeccable. I will never forget my stay at the Kimberly hotel. I can’t wait to stay here again.

title: The best of the best
text: The Kimberly is still the nyc benchmark for Manhattan hotels to be measured by, the staff ( Ralph, Peter ) and all the others are top notch , these people know how to run a quality establishment. We have stayed more times than we can count and each time is better than the last. If you thinking about booking, do not hesitate, it elegant nyc decor and service are unmatched. You can spend more someplace else and it may even appear fancier, but you won’t feel like family unless you stay at the Kimberly, it’s the attention to detail and sincerity of the management and staff, the place is clean beyond any expectations, my wife and I are lucky enough to be able to stay at any hotel in the city, but  it will always be the Kimberly for us, try it, you’ll thank me. respectfully….sf

title: Super proper en ideaalvoor gezinnen
text:
Super leuk en proper boutique hotel
Goed gelegen 
Het enige minpunt is er veel lawaai aan de straatkant maar ze hebben zelfs oordopjes 

Maar kijk is nyc dat moet je dan wel weten 
Leuke zeepjes en geurtjes

Wij hebben niet ontbeten in hotel maar vlak ernaast is een goede restaurant lekker ontbijt of even wandelen naar Ess a Bagel
Ook heel
Lekker

title: Just like home but better
text: If you are looking for a well run,  centrally located hotel with excellent service, spacious accommodations look no further.  My friend and I shared a lovely suite the past few days here.  Although not updated the rooms are very clean and well appointed. Lovey sheets and linen, great ac , perfect kitchenette with great coffee maker.   The restaurant upstairs is fabulous and the staff throughout extremely accommodating.  The Kimberly is a tremendous value and convenient to several bus and subway lines.  We will surely return.

title: Wonderful Stay - Will be back!
text: Pre Covid I went to NYC once or twice a year and always stayed in another hotel in Midtown. I tried this one because I was traveling with a friend and we wanted more room. This hotel is great. Everyone was so helpful and polite. During our stay we met the GM and managers of 2 of the 3 restaurants, who could not have been more gracious. My friend mentionned that I had a birthday coming up and they sent a beautiful dessert plate with Happy Birthday written in chocolate, along with a card.  During a three night stay we ate at the Italian restaurant twice (the pasta with saffron sauce and lobster was wonderful!) the steak house once (seafood salad appetizer was unique and delish) and visited the roof top space for evening drinks and breakfast.  Hotel restaurants don't always have the best food but this place does and the service was first-rate. Room was very clean and had everything you could need. Good location between Lex and 3rd within walking distance of many attractions.  Will definitely go back.

title: Séjour en famille
text:
Nous avons adoré séjourner au Kimberly.
Notre suite 1 chambre était  parfaite pour une famille avec 2 enfants, spacieuse,  très bien équipée.
Le balcon est un vrai plus.
L’hôtel est idéalement situé.
Le personnel est aux petits soins.
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!

title: NYC-Granddaughter’s 1st Visit to the Big Apple
text: The Kimberly was wonderful! Room was spacious, beds were comfortable, kitchenette was well stocked with everything you might need, balcony was a nice bonus and the staff were fantastic! We will definitely stay here whenever we visit NYC…location was centrally located and very walkable. Would highly recommend!

title: 5 Star Service
text: Based on Trip Advisor reviews, I chose The Kimberly for our recent family vacation.  It was the best decision!  The staff are friendly & helpful in all areas, from the doorman who greeted us & unloaded our luggage, to the bellhop who delivered our luggage to the room, to room service who delivered ice within minutes of the request, to housekeeping who thoroughly cleaned our room daily.  We felt like royalty!  We stayed in a suite with two queen beds in one room & a pull-out sofa in the living room.  The bedroom & living room were spacious & included  multiple closets.  The kitchenette included cabinets (stocked with real plates & utensils), mini-fridge, microwave, & even a dishwasher!  Other bonuses included fast elevators (wait time of less than a minute), short walk to metro station, variety of nearby restaurants, & short walks to major attractions.  This was our first stay at The Kimberly, but definitely not our last!

title: Quick get away for my daughter’s first concert
text: We stayed in a very comfortable and roomy two bedroom suite. Staff was friendly and courteous and most importantly , our suite was very clean- not a spec of dust anywhere and not a fingerprint on the glass top tables. I have stayed in many hotels in NYC and other places but the Kimberly is by far the cleanest! I will absolutely stay here again.

title: Our vacation
text:
We love the Kimberly hotel. They have a excellent service and the hotel is very clean. We enjoyed the restaurants in hotel. Delicious food and the bar upstairs has a great view. Their staff is very professional and welcoming 
We I’ll be back again in fall.

title: Great family hotel
text:
Stayed overnight and got the 2 double bed suite. My daughter & 2 grandsons and myself. There was a queen pullout in the living room for the boys so my daughter and I each had a bed in the separate bedroom. Very comfortable, large and quiet room. Easy check in & out online. Keys were ready & waiting for me when I arrived at noon.
Would definitely stay there again. FYI if you need parking 1 block away it’s $80 for 24 hr, what a rip off! 3 blocks away go to MPG Manhattan parking 250 East 53rd st for only $40
Hotel was just as pricey as any good NY hotel.

title: A midtown winner!
text: From the warm welcome by Kirt at the front desk to our positive experiences throughout our stay, we’d surely recommend the Kimberly. Thanks to the entire staff for providing a memorable experience. We look forward to our next visit, hopefully soon!

title: Beautiful Hotel in Midtown Manhattan!
text: This was our second visit to the Kimberly Hotel.  The hotel is just beautiful .. accommodations are spacious, clean and quiet.  Employees treated us like we were royalty.  I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone who prefers suites especially.  Prices here are very reasonable for the size of the room and hotel amenities.  Location is in Midtown which is convenient to many NYC  attractions.

title: Perfect!
text: Traveled to NYC on a family girl trip which included 3 adults and 2 teenagers. The Kimberly was the perfect hotel for our vacation!  We stayed in a 2- bedroom suite which resembled a two story condo. The first floor had an entryway, sitting area, master bathroom, and master suite with a king bed.  Upstairs had a double bed room with entryway and bathroom. Very spacious and comfortable!!!  The view from our rooms was unappealing but that was a non-issue for us…we got the views elsewhere!  Staff was extremely nice, helpful, and accommodating!!! We ate at Bistango for lunch…great food and nice atmosphere.  We ordered room service which was also great and delivered quickly! I would definitely recommend this hotel to families and groups of up to 7.   We truly enjoyed our stay!!  The hotel staff is top notch!!

title: AMAZING!! Don't settle for anything less!!
text: What a wonderful experience. This is turning back time to amazing service, cleanliness, and SPACE. In New York city??? Yes, lots of space for a family of four. Not crammed in a room with two beds and a bathroom. Worth every penny. There is always someone to help with anything you need. Three great restaurants on site. Perfect location to walking, subways and buses. Very safe area. Will never stay anywhere else in New York.

title: Weekend with friends
text: As a repeat customer to the Kimberly, I am always impressed by their ability to go above and beyond. We booked a two bedroom suite and a regular room and requested that the rooms be near each other. Since they had no standard rooms near the two-bedroom suite, they booked our traveling companions in a ine-bedroom suite at the cost of a standard room. Now that's customer service and loyalty to their repeat guests. The staff is always extremely friendly!

title: Old world elegance
text: From the doorman to the front desk staff and each and every detail, this hotel feels European and classic. The toiletries, slippers, linens all creates a five star ambience. And the staff are just so lovely and kind and take care of each guest as though they were VIPs.

title: Birthday Trip to the City
text: Amazing service, clean rooms, and great location! We brought our daughter here for her 5th birthday and we couldn't of picked a better place! From the time we arrived she was treated like a little princess. They welcomed her with a gift bag of treats as soon as they heard it was her birthday and once settled into the room, room service surprised her with a slice of birthday cake with candles. Amazing staff and the rooms are exceptionally big, especially for NYC. I highly recommend staying here!!

title: Heaven on Earth
text:
The staff go above and beyond to make your stay as pleasurable as possible. The doorman welcomes you with a friendly welcome. The front desk is always helpful. The rooms are cleaned by truly caring staff.
The dining is great!

title: Girls Trip!
text: The Kimberly was beautiful, clean, and a good rate for its location. The most impressive part of the hotel  was its staff. I have never stayed anywhere with more friendly and thoughtful employees. I will definitely stay here the next time I am in NYC. A++++!

title: Great place to stay
text: Gracious bellmen and very helpful front desk service. Spacious suite with bathtub and balcony. Easy access to good restaurants and grand central station. Highly recommended for a Spring weekend in NYC.

title: Great hotel
text: Comfortable bed, super nice staff. View from the rooftop restaurant was awesome but the room was a little musty and the view from the room was not good. I'd stay there again and request a room with a balcony.

title: Excellent Hotel and Service
text:
The hotel is amazing. Friendly staff.
Cheryl at the front desk was warm and professional.
The room was super clean and maid service was made without request.
I recommend this hotel 100%.Beyond my expectations!
Just wonderful 

Mariela A.

title: Absolutely amazing … yet again !
text:
We have stayed here several times and it is truly like “coming home “. The hotel itself is beautiful,  the suites are spacious , elegantly decorated and have balconies ( virtually unheard of in NYC). The entire property is immaculate. The rooftop space for breakfast and cocktails is truly akin to eating among the skyscrapers with delicious food. 
All that being said , the most impressive thing about this gorgeous venue is the staff! So many are long term employees and the service culture is impeccable. Harry the doorman is a shining beacon of light welcoming you home. Your needs are anticipated before you even know you need them . Every single staff member from the front desk to the wait staff to the lovely housekeeper is gracious and kind … many thanks dear dear Kimberly! We will be back❤️❤️❤️

title: Super location!
text: The hotel has a really wonderful location and it’s very clean. The Staff is wonderful and helpful  Love the fish tank in the lobby. So much to see in it. Only .7 miles to Central Park.  Great amenities.

title: The rooftop restaurant is suberb in food, service and ambience. It was a GREAT place to have our post-wedding brunch
text: Last week, at our son's post-wedding two hour  brunch we had 80 people on the Rooftop. The food was excellent, the coffee AND tea hot and fresh (tea served separately and the water did NOT taste of coffee, per my wife) The service staff and supervisors were considerate, supportive and wonderful in their work to make a perfect family function,  None of our guests had any complaints(!!)  and with the open air environement we all felt safe from CoVID-19.  Finally, the cost was very reasonable for Manhattan. My wife and I are very much looking forward to returning this summer for our own "secial dinner."

title: WOW WOW WOW
text:
Wow! I don’t know where to begin with this review. We decided on the Kimberly because it was located where we wanted to be, the rooftop and the boutique type hotel. Little did we know that wrapped up in this very special place, we would be treated like royalty! We were made to feel extremely special and extremely cared for by the staff especially Peter at concierge and another gentleman who’s name I cannot recall but I do know he’s been there at the Kimberly for over 30 years! I understand why!!! The concierge / staff sent up sparkling water, fresh berries and a fruit plate that included melon, and pineapples, just because!!!! What? Who does this!? Again, amazing.
The Kimberly has decor that is beautifully done and appeared Edwardian era style but very comfortable & not stuffy. They have thoughtful amenities including coffee, cups and saucers for your coffee or tea,  L’OCCITANE products in the bathroom for shower and body, absolutely beautiful !! We had two full bathrooms, yes, I said “full” and that included two bathtubs and wonderful rain shower heads which made the evenings AND mornings so nice for relaxing after being out walking all day. Plus a balcony!! The bed, forget it, it was soooo comfortable we actually slept in!! We also enjoyed the rooftop bar immensely, great drinks and super tapas! The location was spot on, making it easy to get to where we wanted to go. The doormen were always ready to open doors or hit elevator buttons. Honestly, it felt like home, as though our apartment was upstairs. I doubt we’ll stay anywhere else when we do come back, there’s no need to. Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU!

title: Great hotel for family with teenagers
text: This hotel was a wonderful place to stay! The staff was excellent and helpful. Great location to tourist sites, food and shopping. Quite and could sleep well. I’ve stayed previously in NYC hotels where it is hard to sleep from the constant noise so this was a huge bonus. Probably the part that was the best for our family was the fact it was a suite with a pull out couch. We are a family of four with two teenage boys and it was awesome to give them each their own bed and space. It also had a little kitchen area which was nice for leftovers and we went around the corner to get bagels and got extra for the week since it had a toaster (great money saver for breakfast). The steak house was great. The rooftop restaurant was super cute with great views I went up there every morning for coffee to go we never did the breakfast upstairs but it looked really good. Overall it was exceptional and would definitely stay there again!

title: Great hotel in Midtown Manhattan
text: Great rooms, friendly staff terrific rooftop bar. Heated bathroom floors are a real treat. The hotel is walkable distance from many great restaurants, Times Square, Broadway, and the Metropolitan Museum of modern Art. Would definitely go back.

title: Elegant stay
text: Beautiful large king suite. Large balcony to enjoy city views. Nice restaurants witth good menus. Fitness room was nice and medium size with weights. Excellent customer service.  I enjoyed my stay. Will stay again.

title: Great old style hotel
text: Warm welcome and a great room. The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfortable. The staff was kind and welcoming. The shower was great good pressure  and the towels were great. It was quiet on the floor.

title: Big room, nice hotel, lousy bathroom
text:
Put us in an accessible room we did not request. 
Room had a rain shower that flooded the bathroom floor; toilet handle broken so could not able flush the toilet easily; no shelving the bathroom to out your stuff.  We booked weeks ago on Expedia. 

Room was very big; kitchenette; you rarely see a room this big in NYC.  Check in was a breeze.  Friendly people.  

Did not see the fitness center but from photos looked decent.
Location very good; 15 minute walk to central park.

Price good for the quality of hotel.

Rating would have been better if they had put us in a room with a better working bathroom.

Do Expedia members/bookings get lesser rooms?

title: Great stay
text:
Very comfortable room and helpful staff. Would come again. Would just ask housekeeper not to bang on neighbor’s door yelling “housekeeping” at 8:30 am on Saturday morning 
Really enjoyed breakfast and afternoon snack on the top floor. Location is terrific. We’ll be back

title: Best hotel in NYC
text:
We absolutely LOVE The Kimberly!
Everyone from the doormen, front desks to housekeeping are friendly and professional.
It’s centrally located, always clean and feels like your home away from home.
Great for business, personal or a friends weekend to the city.

title: Hotel convenience with reasonable prices in a good location
text: Staff and accommodations were really good. The room was a bit dated but large and friendly. The balcony was a great space.  Also loved the rooftop lounge.  Will definitely stay here again.  The location is so very convenient to theatre and restaurants

title: Wonderful hotel but questionable rooftop bar staff.
text: This is always my favorite hotel in NYC. It has a great location, the rooms are wonderful, clean, and very roomy, with friendly staff. The rooftop bar could be  fantastic but the staff was not at all friendly and extremely slow. My rating is based on the hotel and not the rooftop bar. It’s a shame I can’t say they both were top notch.

title: Best hotel in NYC!
text: The Kimberly has spacious rooms, which are graciously appointed. Rooms are quiet and clean. Staff is always wonderful. It is conveniently located. The rooftop is a lovely place for breakfast in the morning, or for a drink in the evening.

title: The Kimberly is the best of NYC!
text: The Kimberly is my favorite hotel in New York City for a lot of reasons! The staff is always friendly and helpful, there are a lot of choices in accommodations - all of which are clean, spacious and charming, the public areas are warm and inviting and checking in and out is as simple as clicking a few buttons. I love the Kimberly - can’t say enough good things about it!

title: Kimberly Hotel NYC
text: Old NY decor and convenient location which is convenient to all forms of transportation. Friendly staff and well maintained property. It has a great rooftop bar and another restaurant. Relaxing ambiance since it’s a smaller hotel. Great place to stay for vacation or business.

title: The 2 bed 2 bath suite is the greatest in NYC for a friends or family trip
text: The Kimberly is a lovely hotel in a great location with beautiful pressed linens and exquisite furnishings and attentive staff. We loved dining at Bistango. It is an easy 20 minute walk to Times Square and Chelsea and Central Park. But the best part was a 2 bed 2 bath suite that is impossible to find in the city and so comfortable for a group of friends traveling together. Highly recommended.

title: my new go to hotel in nyc
text:
i loved this hotel! 
the location is great!
it was exceptionally clean!
the rooms are large and lovely!
the fish tank in the lovey is very cool with a huge variety of beautiful fish!
service was excllent!
rooftop restaurant and drinks amazing!!!!

title: Terrible Customer Service
text: Unfortunately, due to the terrible experience we had trying to modify our reservation at the Kimberly we never had a chance to stay here so this review is based on front desk service (specifically Crystal) and not on a stay at the hotel.  Our goal was to push our arrival time back one day.  Our reservation confirmation instructed us to contact the hotel to make changes, so we called the hotel.  On our first call we were instructed to call back in 30 minutes because the person who handled reservations was on break.  We called back a little over an hour later and were asked to hold but were hung up on.  On our third attempt we were informed that we couldn't be helped over the phone and must go online to cancel then rebook our reservation.  I called back and spoke with a "manager" who when asked for his name responded that he was the manager but did not initially give a name.  When pressed he indicated his name was "Homan" (not sure of the spelling).  He indicated he would cancel my reservation.  We'll be staying elsewhere which is unfortunate because we were looking forward to staying at this hotel based on other reviews.

title: Great all-around experience--staff, room, location--would love to come back!
text: For the past 25 years, I have traveled extensively, mostly internationally, but also in the U.S.  This is one of the best hotel experiences I have had anywhere.   The hotel was lovely--great location and my room was spacious, meticulously clean, homey and appropriate to the period without being fusty.  Perfect.  However, the real standout was the staff.  The front desk staff (Claudio and Dusty in particular--they seemed to be there whenever I happened to go in/out), were wonderful.  Since there were some rooms available, they kindly gave me a better location, had lots of suggestions for restaurants, and were just all-around great to talk to.  The bellman and folks out front were also incredibly available and helpful.  I really can't say enough great things about the hotel--it was warm and inviting, and definitely had a "family" feel  (without being claustrophobic or in your space) in the middle of the city.  I feel lucky that I was able to stay there (especially when I saw where my colleagues were!) and give it my highest recommendation.  Hope they have room for me on my next visit!

title: New York at its best
text: I just loved my stay at the Kimberly Hotel.  I have stayed at the hotel in the past and it just keeps getting better.  The staff at the hotel is fabulous from the bellmen, to the front desk to housekeeping to the restuarant staff.  I will be back.  And by the way, do not miss breakfast at the rooftop restaurant.

title: Always a good experience
text: I regularly stay at The Kimberly and I’m always pleased. The rooms are comfortable, the rooftop bar is fun (and has great views of important buildings), the location can’t beat and the staff are friendly. I can’t recommend this hotel enough.

title: Very great hotel in NY
text:
Great hotel with great service !!!
The whole team is nice and always there to help and provide customer informations, advices, solutions…
Great room with balcony! Very large and spacious. Very nice valet and concierge!
This will be our new home when we stay in New York

title: Another perfect stay
text: Another perfect stay at the Kimberly. This is my go to for the 4-5 times Income here. Rooms are spacious. Great location. Breakfast upstairs is a great beginning to the day. Go with a one bedroom suite worth the extra for the space.

title: Our favorite hotel in NY
text: The room was clean, comfortable and spacious.  The staff could not have taken better care of us.  They made you feel like family.  The locations is very safe and convenient to everything thing in Manhattan,   I would highly recommend this beautiful boutique hotel.

title: Top notch.  Excellent.  Well run.  Home away from home.
text: Aside from the comfortable, clean, spacious, and attractive rooms and suites, the desirable location (mid town East is a great part of Manhattan), and the amenities, what impresses me most is the staff.  Many have worked at the Kimberly for years, and opted to return post-pandemic (the hotel shut down during the height of the pandemic).  Everyone I encounter at the Kimberly is highly skilled, friendly, knowledgable, and engaging. I have stayed here many times in the past, and the staff remember me and always welcome me back.  Well run from the top down.  Highly recommended.

title: Our NY favorite Hotel
text: We love this little hotel. Everyone here treats us like family. The central location makes this very convenient to all areas on Manhattan.  the roof top restaurant for breakfast is my favorite as well as for early evening cocktails. The rooms are all nice with many being suites. This is where we always stay. Three great restaurants attached makes it even better.

title: A Home Away From Home
text:
My wife and I have been going to The Kimberly Hotel for many years.  As former New Yorkers we make our trek into the City each year.  We find The Kimberly Hotel one of the most welcoming hotels we've ever stayed at.  

You know the staff are treated well because each year they are still there.  This May 2023 was our first time back into the city since Covid.  The doormen recognized us and welcomed us back warmly.  The front desk remembered us and and made us feel most welcome.  Even the server on their marvelous rooftop bar and breakfast buffet greeted us with a yelp of, "You're back!"  

The hotel is well situated on 50th street between 3rd and Lexington.  It is well kept and maintained but ultimately it is the staff that makes the experience memorable. It is our home away from home when we are in the City and I think that if you stay here you will feel the same.

title: A Quaint Spot in Midtown
text:
The Kimberly is a hidden gem in the heart of midtown.  A unique and luxurious experience that made my Dad's first trip to NYC a  memory of a lifetime.  The location is also unbeatable, with a short walk to Rockefeller and Time Square for the touristy part of our trip.  I think my Dad would have honestly been ok if we had  spent the entire trip at the hotel!

PS- Don't miss the amazing views on the rooftop bar, PH level!  Bistangos is also a great option for Italian if you want a nice relaxing evening in!

title: Fabulous Gals' Bday weekend in the heart of NYC!
text: What a charming, customer centric hotel! I cannot say enough good things about this property. The perfect place for our group of 6 gals to celebrate a special birthday. Our initial reservation was for (2) 1 BR suites with 2 bathrooms !!! in each to accommodate our party of 6 but unfortunately, available only on different floors. When we checked in, we were excited to find that not only were our rooms now across from each other but 1 of the rooms was upgraded to a 2 bedroom suite! The rooms were lovely-in a grand NY style with plenty of space, modern bathrooms, comfortable beds (we all slept so well, city noise was not an issue!) and even outdoor terraces with plenty of seating-if only the weather cooperated. Both suites had spiral staircases up to the bedrooms which was a unique feature. We walked to dinner, walked about 20ish minutes to Broadway & back. Upon our return, we were delighted to find a chilled bottle of Prosecco &  chocolate covered strawberries awaiting us, complements of The Kimberly! Our celebration continued, my sister will not forget this special birthday. Highly recommend this property-for a romantic weekend or a girl's weekend- it's close to everything, they will take good care of you. And brunch in Bistango, the on site restaurant was lovely. Will return. Thank you Kimberly Hotel for a wonderful weekend!

title: Great Place, Excellent Staff
text: Myself, parents, siblings, and children stayed for my youngest sister's wedding, which was at the Kimberly. The Kimberly is in a great location, the rooms were excellent. The staff and service was very accommodating and on-point. The wedding itself and reception were in the Upstairs at the hotel, a great rooftop venue perfectly suited for the event, and we had a great experience thanks to the support of the Kimberly staff. It's a gem.

title: Excellent value and location with great amenities
text:
My wife & I stayed in a two bedroom suite with our children (ages 3 & 5) for a busy long weekend.  The Kimberly was an excellent choice!  While its interior & decor is a touch dated, everything we wanted/needed for our stay we had, and service was excellent.

The room was like a classic NYC apartment with two bathrooms and two great bedrooms, and the living room had a sofa bed we could use when grandparents came to babysit!  The location in East Midtown (right by the 6 on 51st and E on 53rd) is great for accessing a lot of different neighborhoods, and there are tons of good value restaurants/cafes/coffee shops, even grocery stores, within blocks.

Even the gym is great, with a bar for pull ups, and a rowing machine so you can get an intense workout in a small space.

Very happy with our choice - really couldn't have been better for our budget.  (To be clear, this was a push-the-boat-out weekend for our 10 yr anniversary and some birthdays, but we didn't want to THROW money away!)

title: Good hotel,poor service
text:
We came as bigger group and we were welcomed by lovely doormans and their hospitality. 
Each of our rooms were amazing, huge beds, kitchen, microwave and they also gave us complimentary champagne and cheese board. 
Hotel is very close to times Square, central park and many popular sites.
They have beautiful fish tank in the lobby of hotel and right next to it is very cozy Italian restaurant that we tried our first night and it was delicious. 
They also have one more restaurant in the lobby of hotel, we didn't have time to eat there but the place looks amazing. 
Breakfast is served at their rooftop lounge and it's actually one of the best hotel breakfast options I ever had. ( Breakfast server/manager was excellent )
Now,the reason for such a low rating is because the way we were treated at the same rooftop lounge where we had best breakfast ever but at night time.
Such disappointed. 
It was a Saturday night, they seemed very slow, and even though we didn't had reservation, they had many empty tables. 
After a very rude welcome, they gave us table at the very end of restaurant that we had to help putting together. 
Waitress came once to ask for our order and it felt we were bothering her simply with our presence there.
Every staff member seemed more interested at having fun around the bar then actually cater to their guests. 
We jokingly asked our waitress for more attention because one of our attendees had a birthday,she rolled her eyes,went to their staff party at the bar, and we could just see all of them looking at us and laughing. 
Very unfortunate ending to our stay at Kimberly hotel.
Having this beautiful rooftop lounge at this amazing location, one would think that management would care more to train their staff for a common courtesy and hospitality. 
We were all deeply disappointed.

title: Amazing hidden gem - can’t recommend enough - thank you to all at The Kimberley for making our NYC so perfect!
text: Just back from a week at the Kimberley and we couldn’t recommend it highly enough. Fantastic location in midtown, spotlessly clean, HUGE rooms, great luxury of a balcony (so rare in Manhattan!) and amazing staff - special shout out to Harry the doorman who made our stay so special from the moment we arrived, every day greeting our two boys with his high fives to the moment we left. Harry made the boys NYC experience! Bistango (one of the hotel restaurants) was also fantastic - the best pizzas and a fab little outdoor terrace too. Thank you to everyone who made our week in the city so perfect - we will def be staying here again when we’re back and recommending to friends and family. An absolute gem of a find!

title: Great stay
text: Good big suite. Beds comfortable. Great location. Didn't use rooftop bar in evening as 12 yr old understandably not allowed. Another lounge area to have a drink with daughter in tow would have been nice. Would stay again.

title: Winning combination
text: Convenient location, close to major sites but not dreadfully busy, really large, comfortable rooms with a balcony and kitchenette, and great value deals available. We were delighted with this hotel and would recommend it to anyone. Staff were friendly and I was sent a bottle of wine and a beautiful snack platter for my birthday.

title: Excellent Hotel
text:
Very friendly staff and close to major tourist spoys. Great hotel if you have kids. Lots of reatauramts close by. Center of all fun stuff
 They treat you like family. There is microwave and fridge in the room

title: Gem of a hotel
text: I adored this hotel. The inside is beautiful and the room was spacious. I really appreciated all of the closets and dressers for storage. There were three large closets and 2 dressers. Our room was not facing the street so it was surprisingly quiet. The kitchenette was sleek with a wonderful espresso/coffee machine. We appreciated having a refrigerator and microwave. We ate at two of the hotel’s restaurants: Bistango for dinner and breakfast at Upstairs, the beautiful rooftop restaurant. Both places had solid food and very friendly wait staff. The location was great, just two blocks away from the subway. There is a giant circular fish tank inside the lobby, which my kids loved. I am not sure why anyone would choose to stay at a chain hotel when they could stay at such a charming hotel like The Kimberly. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Awesome Stay!
text: Loved the room, it was exactly what we needed for our family. The customer  service was seamless and the in room dining quality!  We will definitely be back!  The valet team was awesome! We loved the Rooftop lounge! I am so glad I found this hotel on line.

title: A great option for space and a bit of old New York glamour in midtown.
text: What a great, family friendly boutique hotel in the middle of everything! We were able to walk so many places (the theater, Central Park, Rockefeller Center), but the subway was also very close! We had a very spacious and meticulously clean suite with plenty of room for our family of 5. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. The valet parking was easy and convenient. We will be back!

title: Stayed at Kimberly for ILR classes
text: Great hotel, easy walking distance to my classes, the Empire steak house is outstanding. Will be staying again in three weeks. Rooms were clean and well appointed. Staff was very helpful and nice. Multiple dining options within wasy walking distance and a conveinience store right around the corner.

title: Quaint boutique suite hotel in the heart of Midtown
text: The location of The Kimberly is perfect for visiting the Midtown attractions as it's only a few blocks from Rockefeller Center but it's also slightly away from the busiest areas. There are also plenty of places to eat in the immediate vicinity for convenience, as well as in the hotel itself. The spacious suites are definitely of an older style but everything is functional and comfortable. The beds are comfortable and the sofa bed is one of the best sofabeds I've seen. The rooms also have a balcony, microwave, coffee machine (pod style), toaster and a fridge. Finally, the staff is nice and accomodating for the most part, and doorman/porter Ralph is an amazing guy who gives this place warmth and character. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Cute and quaint hotel!
text: Absolutely loved this hotel! Courteous staff. Room was spacious and quiet - which is nice when staying in the city. Convenient for walking. Lots of delicious places to eat - morning, noon and night. Will definitely stay here again when visiting.

title: Fantastic Stay
text: Our trip was wonderful from beginning to end. The staff at this hotel has really perfected customer service and excelled in this capacity throughout our stay.  We travel a lot internationally and domestically and this hotel exceeded all of our expectations.  Our children loved it and especially appreciated the two restaurants in the lobby.  We will be back!

title: A great choice for your NYC!
text: We love the location in midtown.  The hotel is impeccable and the rooms are spacious and beautiful!  Staff is great, in particular, Ralph went out of his way to make us feel welcome, special and at home, what a great guy who goes above and beyond!

title: My NYC home from now on
text: Stayed here 10 years ago and fondly recalled this location;  returned  in March 2023 on a family splurge trip to NYC, 4 nights in the 2 bedroom/bath suite.   Nice!   The Kimberly did not disappoint!      The best part of this room is the 26th floor views through the corner windows.   Wow amazing - toward 50th (and the crown of the Chrysler building) and then toward 3rd Ave (and the East River).   Sunrise in the glass canyon was an event - seeing the rising sun reflected on numerous adjacent buildings was surreal.     Service and attention to guests was top notch.    Housekeeping, Doormen and Bell Staff, Valet, Desk Staff - everyone smiled and greeted the guests.      The beds were super comfortable (and we are picky!)  and amenities were great.  And then the mid town location is perfect.      I will surely return next time in NYC!

title: Great money value and great location
text:
Great location & amazing breakfast on the rooftop 
Gréât staff specially the bell boys always smiling and helpful 
Breakfast team  great selection and service 
Special thanks to the maid who made my room suite 29F 11 to 18 March impeccable really

title: Amazing time at The Kimberly Hotel! I definitely recommend!
text: Amazing trip to NYC with my friend (Kimberly) who had never been to the city. I had stayed at The Kimberly previously and thought it would be fun to stay there again since they share a name.  The room was opulent and perfect for the two of us.  It has an "old world feel" without missing any of the modern amenities. Location is also ideal since it is within walking distance to most attractions we were interested in seeing.  Will definitely stay there again.

title: A great spot for a weekend getaway!
text: We stayed one night and enjoyed the great views of the Midtown skyline.  The suite was immaculate and so quiet.  The bedding was comfortable and the robes and slippers were an excellent touch!  A great place to stay for a weekend getaway; three train stops to Broadway shows and Times Square.

title: Hotel excelente e quarto perfeito
text: Espetacular a experiência de nos hospedar nesse hotel. Hotel perfeito, com funcionários cordiais e atenciosos. Localização excelente, quarto perfeito, temos somente elogios. Restaurante no topo do hotel.

title: Awesome - but don’t sleep on sofa bed.
text: Great experience. Only drawback was that the sofa bed was not comfortable for our teen at all. But otherwise, great experience. But the staff were very kind and helpful. The Italian restaurant was very good.

title: Front desk and door staff are phenomenal!
text:
I brought my college aged daughter to NYC to celebrate her birthday. I was not sure whether to choose a hotel closer to Times Square or stay at The Kimberly but we were not disappointed. The location was great and was not as hectic. Harry, the doorman was so kind and we will remember him forever!! We did not spend a ton of time in our room but it was very cozy. We had to change rooms due to no hot water and banging pipes in the first but our new room was much nicer (we were given a suite)! Large rooms for New York! The beds in the second room were especially comfortable. The rainfall shower was awesome, I was expecting very little water pressure but I was surprised that it was amazing! We had a balcony but we were on a low floor facing the building behind, it was chilly so we would not have used it anyway plus it was much quieter facing inward than towards the street. The room price is reasonable when you take into consideration the level of service. 

Only minor complaints for which I would not take away any stars for, 1. it was obvious when our housekeeper changed. Our first one did a great job and left us extra towels when I asked. The second one did not leave the towels when I left a note asking them to and I also had to ask for the toiletries to be replenished as I had used all of the body wash. 2. Really seems to be an issue I have in almost every hotel I stay in, it is impossible to get the room temperature comfortable. The heaters/air conditioners never stopped running no matter what the temperature was set to and they were fairly loud. Maintenance did fix one issue with the heater very quickly!

We ate at the Italian Restaurant downstairs and the food was delicious! Next time I would definitely like to try the breakfast and upstairs lounge.

I will most definitely stay here again when returning to NYC! thank you The Kimberly for helping make this a memorable trip!

title: Great stay!
text: We were very pleased with our room, the friendly and accommodating staff, having restaurants as an option on the hotel and the location in midtown. The overall ambiance was warm and welcoming. We will definitely stay there again.

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text: Tired of small NYC hotel rooms?  The Kimberly has oversized rooms that are very nice to relax in.  The staff is wonderful including the very attentive maids for the rooms.  We could not have been happier with our choice for a weekend get away.  It is located close to almost everything.  They offer a fantastic breakfast on the top floor as well.  Summertime would be fun up there!

title: Great place to stay
text:
A hidden gem. The Kimberly is a well-located hotel in mid-town Manhattan which has it all. The rooms are spacious, well decorated and comfortable. The staff couldn’t be more attentive. The restaurants are attractive and offer very reasonably-priced and very tasty  food. The value for your buck is amazing. 

This is now our go-to hotel in Manhattan.

title: problemi della camera risolti brillantemente
text: dopo un inizio non molto felice per una serie di problemi della camera prenotata ci è stata cambiata con un appartamento di grande comfort. sicuramente la professionalità del signore alla reception è ineguagliabile perché si è fatto carico del problema e lo ha risolto in pochi minuti ! chapeau👍

title: Elegant, luxurious hotel experience
text: Without a doubt this is a truly elegant hotel experience. The rooms are decorated beautifully, with a bedroom balcony and heated bathroom floors. The bed is cushy and sumptuous. There are several connected restaurants as well as room service.

title: Clean and pretty room but really badly insulated
text: The hotel room was pretty and very clean. The location was fantastic. However, I am just giving 4 stars because there was such an air flow coming into the room from both windows. It was as if they were a bit open but they weren't. Insulation was not good at all. Even with all the curtains down, you could clearly feel the freezing air flow. We should have made a complain and get another room but that one was already the second room we got because in the first one the keys wouldn't work and we had already wasted half an hour trying to get our problem solved.

title: Unexpected midtown gem
text: Everything was great at the Kimberly.  We were able to upgrade to a suite with a balcony for $30.  Valet was easy and available.  We even got to check in at 10:30 am!  The restaurant was good and the wait staff great. We’ll be back

title: Great hotel! Impressive! A throwback to fantastic service!
text:
Traveled to NY from Louisiana with my wife and two daughters Feb 20th thru 24th. Our first time at the Kimberly.  From check-in to check-out, everything was perfect. The room was very spacious and clean, with upscale furnishings and more than enough space to spread out. Our room had a kitchenette, which came in handy. Every member of the staff we encountered was great, friendly and pleasant to deal with.  Very helpful. The first night we arrived late and went to the Upstairs Bar on the top floor. Great selections and beautiful views The bar at the attached Empire Steak house was great. We visited every night before we headed out to our evening show. Bartenders and manager were awesome. The location was perfect for us. We did the 7 day metro pass and used the subway most of the time. Access points are all there. The location is very safe.
I highly recommend the Kimberly. I look forward to staying again.

Thank you guys and gals for making our trip to New York that much better.

title: Excellent staff
text: The staff is amazing - Ralph took excellent care of us.  Beds and shower both so relaxing. Clean rooms with a great location, close to so many attractions. .  Definitely will stay here again.  Looking forward to our next visit!

title: Another Stellar Stay
text: We love this hotel. Our January 2023 stay was great and the location cannot be beat. The doormen and housekeeping staff are top notch. It’s a favorite hotel for my family and friends and we always check for availability and deals before checking other hotels. Love Upstairs at The Kimberly for breakfast or anytime. We have never stayed in a room that offers a good view, but that doesn’t bother us.

title: Great Hotel Experience!
text: We all loved The Kimberly! The staff was so kind and helpful. Our room was beautiful--well appointed. There were three of us, mother, daughter and sister--all together-- in a double queen room. We did this intentionally so we could all be together- after not seeing one another due to covid. The size and room worked actually well for us--and my sister can be critical--but she loved it too!  The beds were really comfy and the bathroom was perfect. It is in a great location--we walked and took cabs. I will definitely recommend and return again and again.

title: Perfect stay with kids
text: Perfect stay with wife and two kids ages 10 and 11. We had the two bed suite with balcony on the 19th floor.  Service was perfect. Location was great as it was not far from tourist areas but far enough where it was relaxing.  Valet was flawless.  WiFi was great.  Kitchenette had everything we needed and was a bonus.  Bathroom clean and well thought out.  Great breakfast place right next door.  The pullout couch was the best we’ve ever used - just like a real bed.  Kids really enjoyed the stay and this is where we will book in NYC going forward.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Wonderful hotel.  Spacious rooms for NYC.  Very clean.  Great location.  Valet parking was easy.  Staff were friendly & helpful.  Booked this hotel for a long weekend with family.  Couldn't have been more pleased.

title: Perfect Girls Trip Getaway
text: If you are looking for a great hotel for your friends in NYC in midtown, look no further! Service was exceptional here! The hotel was perfect for my two friends and I to share a 1 bedroom suite. The balcony overlooked the streets of NY and added to the ambiance. The furnishings were elegant and classy. I am a travel agent and will be referring all my clients to stay here!

title: Best NYC Hotel
text: Perfect.  Great location, quiet.  Staff was incredibly friendly.  The nicest hotel room we’ve stayed at in Manhattan.  The room was very large and very clean. We can’t wait to come back.  We saw a great show and the Kimberly made a great trip.

title: Coming Home!
text: Kimberley Hotel is our home away from home. We stay here every time we visit the city...and so comforting to see the same familiar faces. Several couples stay and they are so accommodating, often placing us on the same floors together. Make sure your next trip to the city includes accommodations at The Kimberley Hotel...and elevate your next vacation or business trip to perfection!

title: Beautiful Classy Suite with Comfortable Bed!
text: Beautiful suite, tons of room and VERY comfortable bed! They thought of everything to make our stay special- robes, slippers and even umbrellas! We had lots of windows, a beautiful bar/kitchen area, a balcony and a rain shower head in the bathroom. We were even greeted at our Lyft by the doorman who brought our bags in for us!  We loved staying here!

title: Love this place!
text:
You can’t beat this hotel - great location, service and a bargain for a one bedroom suite with or without the senior discount which we got.  We love the rooftop bar, too.
Small, but nice fitness center. Staff is friendly and helpful.  We always like to stay here
when we come to NYC and discovered it about 13 years ago.  Bathroom lighting 
could be better but  most hotels have poor lighting in the bathroom.  We also like
The robes and slippers!  Highly recommend staying here.

title: The very best of NYC in this hotel
text:
Our first time in NYC as a couple and we naturally booked a hotel that bore my wife’s name. From checking in to allowing us to extend our check out til 1 pm, this hotel and more importantly its incredible team showed the very best of NYC love. The rooms were extremely generous, clean and had all the essential items one would expect. Filter coffee in our room was a nice touch. 
There is not one person during our stay who was more helpful than the others. They were all equally amazing. 
I cannot thank this wonderful hotel and its team for their kindness and giving us fabulous memories of our time in NYC. The Kimberly Hotel has definitely given us a reason to return.

title: Friends trip
text: The Kimberly is an utterly elegant hotel; everything done with polish and hushed sophistication. And leading the way is Ralph Faccilongo who greets every guest with the most genuine warmth and the biggest smile. He just makes one happy to be there. There are not enough stars for Ralph or The Kimberly!

title: Location, staff and amenities
text: The Kimberly is a beautiful executive property with old world style NYC that radiates class and elegance. The staff went absolve and beyond to ensure our stay was perfect. Also the restaurants and bars were very nice. Located in East Midtown, Manhattan the location is perfect walking distance to Park Ave shopping, Central Park, Time Square, Grand Central Station and the stunning St. Patrick’s Cathedral. We will most definitely return!

title: Amazing Stay
text: The staff, the location and the room were excellent. Yes its loud area because its the city. The windows are a little thin, which can make the room a little cold in winter, but the room was spacious and quiet overall. We never heard our neighbors or anyone in the hallway. I would stay here again.

title: Big rooms, Friendly staff, good location
text:
When we pulled up, it was the most friendly and efficient (and early) check in we have had in years. 

The rooms are incredibly spacious and you are just nine blocks from Grand Central station, and less than 8 mins to 5th Ave. 

The staff is very friendly. The rain shower excellent.

title: Luxurious trip for a special birthday
text: I reviewed many hotels before choosing The Kimberley. I wanted a luxurious break for me and my grown up family for my birthday. I asked for rooms near by, we got interconnecting rooms which was perfect. The location is ideal, just a short walk from Grand Central Station. We had buffet breakfast, which was delicious and well stocked. We visited the bar “Upstairs” rooftop bar, it had breathtaking views over the city. You can clearly see the Chrysler Building. The staff were all very helpful and friendly, and the rooms were incredibly comfortable. There are also restaurants within the hotel which we visited too. Would happily return. Be warned it is very noisy at night, with traffic, which is expected in New York, there are earplugs in the room if you need them.

title: Wonderful stay
text: This was an amazing hotel experience for NYC.  A 600 square foot suite that was beautifully furnished, with every amenity you could think of.  And the housekeeping service was impeccable which we really appreciated since we had a kitchenette.  All staff were extremely helpful.  Nice safe neighborhood with three amazing restaurants on site.  We were there for a medical appointment but The Kimberly helped to make it a positive experience.  Will definitely return.

title: Quintessential New York hotel.
text: Quintessential New York hotel. Elegant and sophisticated. Yet comfortable and welcoming! The Kimberly will be our go to hotel! Room was super clean and large.  Doorman always greeted us upon entry and leaving. We are looking forward to our next stay at the Kimberly!

title: What a gem!
text: I recently planned a trip to NYC for my husband’s 65th birthday and stayed at the Kimberly. I spend a lot of time in the city and always stay on the east side. We stayed at The Kimberly about 8 years ago and had a lovely stay, although it was only one night. Because I generally go to the city to see my doctors, I usually just choose a cheaper hotel, one of  the chain types. But this time I wanted to stay somewhere nice and make a really nice event out of it for the birthday weekend. I chose a king suite and surprised my husband with the suite (along with a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries which I ordered online when I checked in and which was delivered moments after we got to our room. The  suite was beautifully appointed, very clean and looked to be well maintained. No worn or tired furnishings. There were two closets with big plushy robes, slippers, umbrellas and a shoeshine machine, the likes of which I haven’t seen in years. There is also a full height cabinet with a small bar with all the major liquors, wines and champagne, fridge with sodas and mixers, sparkling and still water, coffee maker, snacks, glassware and bar sink. We made full use of it! The bathroom was very large and well stocked with L’Occitane bath products and even a scale. The living area was very comfortable, especially the comfy couch where we would have after dinner cocktails and watch a movie under a cozy blanket. We did not eat in either of the two lobby level restaurants however we did take advantage of the rooftop bar called Upstairs which is enclosed with glass walls and roof and provides a view of the Chrysler building. They also serve small bites dinner menu and breakfast. We had the breakfast buffet and the offerings although pretty standard were delicious. It’s really a beautiful space and during the summer the glass roof and walls retract. It’s a lovely hotel and I’ll now be staying there regularly. The best thing about the Kimberly is  their staff who are all very friendly and take care of any request, big or small with such a pleasant and friendly attitude. From the minute we arrived until the minute we left, the staff was there to serve. We used the service elevator because it was right outside our room and there were usually housekeeping or maintenance staff using it. They were all so kind and pleasant and sincere and always struck up a conversation. From bringing us ice without us having requested it to bringing us water bottles while we waited in the lobby one afternoon, to the doormen who insisted on assisting us with our bags even though they were small and easily handled by us, every single  member of their staff was attentive, friendly and helpful. We will definitely be returning time and time again. I actually can’t wait for the next time.

title: Wonderful stay at The Kimberly!
text: We stayed at The Kimberly Feb 1-5, 2023. Extremely friendly, helpful staff. Great location. Rooms were spacious and clean, one-bedroom suite was perfect for my wife, son, and I, he loved sleeping on the fold-out couch, which was incredibly comfortable. Elevators were super-quick. Quiet, elegant atmosphere. Will definitely stay here again. Highly recommend!

title: The Kimberly is fabulous!
text: Great stay!  Rooms are huge, good location, and the best rooftop eatery and bar. Ralph recommended a great local dinner place and amazing sushi place close by. Walked to everything. Will stay here again.

title: Kimberly Experience
text:
Totally enjoyed  our stay at Kimberly Hotel.  Luxurious, clean, peaceful. The roof top restarant was absolutely my favorite to eat and drink.  The wait service was impeccable at all levels.   The views of NYC skyline was memorable. Intimate seating  was comfortable and romantic.  The front desk staff were all efficient and informative.  I felt like having a world class feeling. The doormen were especially attentive.  The luxurious bedding and  toiletries were Perfect. The suites felt like European luxury .  The experience was truly beyond first class. The only less than positive memory was being told the hotel Italian restaurant was closing at 9:00 pm.  While we arrived at 8:15 we were told that the restarant would close promptly.  We were encouraged, by the hostess, to request room service.  

Overall we had an amazing experience.  We will return.

title: Could have been much better
text: So I came and got the executive guest room suite with the balcony and hot tub for the night of my birthday I booked over a month before. First the room was set up really nice but the problem is the balcony wasn’t exactly a balcony to actually be able to see the view of the city which was disappointing on the 22nd floor but the lower floors have actual balconies. The monsoon shower was not thoroughly cleaned at all and neither was the hot tub which was extremely disappointing with the pricing of the room I would expect it to be cleaned very well. I wouldn’t recommend the suite I would downgrade honestly and for the hot tub the shower prices did not even work.

title: Great hotel, location, room, staff
text: Great option in mid town NYC, loved everything about this hotel.  Staff were incredibly nice and the room was big and clean.  Highly recommend.  Great location as well.  Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again.

title: Amazing experience
text: This is a great hotel where every detail of service is available and the dedicated staff take care of everything. The rooms are large and well appointed w modern luxury and classic design. It’s a very quiet hotel with comfortable beds and full kitchens as desired. The location is perfect away from Times Square yet only a mile from the furthest theater. We loved our 5 night stay

title: Incredible hotel!
text: I can’t say enough good things about this hotel. It is beautiful, old and full of character. Incredible staff. Wonderful location. So much more spacious than anything else in Manhattan. A very luxurious and comfortable place to stay with a family. And terrific value. A rare hotel that checks all the boxes. We will be back!

title: Comfortable boutique hotel in Manhattan
text: Very nice boutique hotel! Bed was very comfortable, great toiletries (L'Occitane), 2 umbrellas in the room, ear plugs, robes & slippers, microwave & fridge. What more could you ask for!!! Friendly staff 24hrs. Great upstairs lounge.  I really liked the vintage decorations and feel of the hotel. The only con, which the hotel can't control is the noise from the street, but thanks to the east plugs provided it was minimized.

title: Girls weekend!
text: We have been coming to the  Kimberly for over 7 years for our annual girls weekend.  Great location which is perfect for shopping, theater, sightseeing.  Always book our one bedroom suite, and the three of us have plenty of room to spread out using 2 queens and sofabed.  Wine, cheese, snacks in the perfect midtown setting.

title: Came in unsure.  Left 100% certain to return!
text:
From the outside and lobby you get the feeling this hotel has a lot of miles on it.  It’s not flashy or modern by any stretch of the imagination.  Only 2 elevators and not much going on in the lobby.  Everything is brass. Everywhere.  Like it was in the 80’s.  Then you get to your room and it’s sort of a 1980’s baroque furniture and finish motif.  You’re not sure if it’s antique or not, but it feels well loved. 

But then you realize the bedding and sheets are fantastic.  And you see the L’Occitane quality bath products, and you notice that the suites are perfectly sized, with a nice little alcove for doing makeup, a great little kitchenette and bar area both fully stocked, a nice work area, fast, simple to use internet, and ample hot water and water pressure.  And over the next few days you and your spouse keep saying to each other “this place is pretty great!”  Housekeeping was top notch, and everyone was friendly across the board. 

I came to very much appreciate all of the quirks as character.  No sterile boring rooms as you get with the big chain hotels.  Pricing was very reasonable for the quality of service and amenities.  Location was perfect for us - away from the mess of Times Square, but within a few blocks of a couple subway stations to take you easily anywhere you want to go. 

Bellmen were all super friendly and professional as well.  I’m sure they’re highly under-appreciated for the great work they do.  Make sure to tip them!

title: Highly recommend for a special romantic trip to NYC.  Romantic!!
text:
Romantic.   Lovely gorgeous, charming, opulent, warm and inviting.   

Staff are all very professional and helpful.   Rooms are large especially considering this is Manhattan.   Beds are VERY comfortable.. furniture is artwork gorgeous.   Our room had well equipped kitchen,  desk, table, chairs.  Bathroom gorgeous.   Everything was well cared for.

Rooftops bar/restaurant is a MUST.  Good drinks, great music and the VIEWS are so very nice.

Parking nearby and you can have them park your car for you until late at night.

title: President, XTENN
text: My stay at The Kimberly Hotel was wonderful..  very comfortable and clean room, linens and bed/pillows very comfortable, and having 3 choices for food within the hotel complex, made it very convenient.. I will stay here again when I’m NY..

title: Delightful surprise!
text:
Earned a free night for staying 2 nights at a BW hotel out west. Never thought we'd be able to use it in Manhattan on a weekend, but we could, at the Kimberly, which I didn't even know was affiliated with BW initially.  We were not expecting much since BW chain is very average but predominant out west. The Kimberly blew us away!!! 

We arrived 3 hours early but our room was ready. It was a suite with a BALCONY (who has a balcony at a hotel in NYC?!?!). Old World elegance throughout. It was exceptionally clean, traditional furniture, completely separate living room, huge bathroom with a HEATED FLOOR and rainfall shower (per my husband, the best he's ever seen)! Beautiful rooftop bar surrounded by the lights of Manhattan. Two restaurants (though we ate elsewhere). Staff was exceptionally helpful and pleasant, from the doorman to reception to a lovely woman who saw us peeking in the Italian restaurant and walked us around to show us where things were in lobby. Great location, surrounded by restaurants, and walking distance to Time Square, Rock Ctr., and Broadway. This place made our weekend away an exceptional experience. Thank you, Kimberly Hotel!!

title: Our new NYC home away from home
text: Outstanding customer service from all, especially Ava. The room was lovely and spacious. Check-in was easy and accommodating. Rooftop bar was good too.  This will now be our go-to NYC hotel.  Again, the service was excellent.

title: Fabulous Stay
text: The room was tastefully decorated and extremely clean! It has the charm and elegance of the "old time" hotels with all the modern conveniences. Staff went above and beyond to make our stay great. Would highly recommend this wonderful welcoming hotel!

title: Girls Weekend
text: My daughter and I took her 2 girls for a long weekend in NYC and had a great time!  Room was a one bedroom suite 2 double beds with a pull out couch in the living area. The Kimberly from Nick the door man to chatting with an employee of the upstairs bar  and having him bring us two glasses of champagne to our room when we told him we couldn’t go up because of the girls  The entire weekend was amazing. !! Already planning our next trip!!

title: Amazing Experience in NYC
text: We visit NYC often, and each time we stay somewhere different (different hotels, different areas). The Kimberly will definitely be a hotel we return to often. Everything about this hotel is great. Its location, the staff, the hotel itself, and the rooms. The staff are kind, respectful, and extremely helpful. The hotel is exquisite, both the lobby and the rooms themselves. We stayed in a one-bedroom suite, and it was one of the nicer rooms in NY, especially the size (we even had a balcony). Comfortable bed, large kitchenette, what's not to love?

title: The Kimberly is a Unique and refreshing place to stay!
text: The staff at this hotel is exceptional and have great attention to detail. From the doorman to the front desk, they made sure everything was taken care of and much of it without asking. The rooms are large, spacious and extremely clean. The accoutrements are top shelf. There are even books in the room for your comfort and enjoyment. The hotel has old world charm and makes you feel like you are actually at a hotel instead of a corporate stay hotel.  Also worth noting is its easy access to midtown tunnel and the airport… We very much are looking to return soon…

title: Best kept secret
text: Bellman, front desk staff, ladies that clean the rooms ALL amazing!! Can’t say enough good things about this hotel. The suite is very spacious. We stayed a full week and it was definitely not crowded at all. Location also amazing! Just a few blocks from Rockefeller and few blocks farther to time square.

title: Last minute overnight and it was amazing!
text: This place is beautiful. Room was amazing and more than exceeded my expectations. The bed is AMAZING. The food was delicious and room service was very quick. Everyone was so nice and helpful. I can’t wait to go back!

title: Quick getaway
text: The Kimberly is a GEM. Everyone on the staff makes you feel very important and that it is their pleasure to take care of you. From doorman to check in to the restaurant to the rooftop bar it is amazing. The Kimberly is clean and the decor is old world charm and sophistication. The bed was very very comfy, soft sheets and fluffy pillows. Towels were a bit rough but the bathrobes make up for that. TV did not get great reception however we weren’t there to watch television. Perfect location to walk to many great venues or the train is around the corner and of course the doorman is quite accommodating and will hail a cab for you as well. We took advantage of all three. Honestly if you just wanted to stay put you would have everything you need right there. We will definitely be returning for our romantic weekend away and with family and friends.

title: Price performance ratio exceptional for Manhattan standards
text: We stayed here for 5 nights. Compared with other hotels in Manhattan within the same star category, this hotel was a lot cleaner, the rooms were a lot bigger (with kitchenette and even a dishwasher) and a bath room with a lot of space. Coffee, water and towels were provided daily and room/cleaning service was punctual and accurate. Gym was clean and sufficient for a workout. Thank you, we will come again!

title: Fantastic welcoming feeling start to finish at the Kimberly.  Huge fan!!!!
text:
i love this hotel.  The Staff is incredible.  Arian the head waiter for the breakfast buffet on the roof is so attentive and makes sure the coffee is just right.  Harry the head doorman is a legend and always there to be helpful and remember your name.  Mentor is one of the front of house staff members who goes above and beyond to make sure you have a great stay from transportation to greeting my family.  The best staff and accomodations in NYC!!  Thank you all...  
Rudi from Boston.  Loyal Customer always!!!!!

title: Excellent hotel!
text: The Kimberly is a wonderful hotel, perfectly situated to everything. The staff is friendly, the rooms are gorgeous with a comfort and elegance not usually found. Lots of closets and drawer space. Restaurants and room service make the Kimberly a great place to stay!

title: Great location and superb service!
text: First time staying at The Kimberly and we loved it!! The staff were wonderful and helpful. Every single staff went above and beyond. The suite was spacious. Amenities in the room were a nice extra. Carpets a little dated but that is the only negative. The location was perfect. Will definitely be back! Thanks for a wonderful weekend.

title: Best Family Hotel in NYC!
